1.content:
This story is about boys.

More specifically, this interactive is about boys who are tiny.

More specifically, this interactive is about boys who are tiny in comparison to the giantesses in this story.

The boy could have been shrunken down by a science experiment, an unknown virus or chemical, or is the product of "reversal pituitary glands" where he shrinks while experiencing the early stages of puberty.

The boy could have been born tiny, living with a loving family of women, abandoned at an early age for his tiny size, living as a scavenger and keeping hidden from the eyes of the giants, or was left at an all-girls orphanage and adopted.

The boy could be born like a normal-sized kid, but the girls and women in his life are more massive than him, including his family and relatives. Maybe he had a chance encounter with a giantess in a dense part of the woods, anthropomorphized animals who are living in captivity in a zoo, or he could be the next ruler of these giant women.

The boy could have created a portal into another world which is inhabited by giantesses, or into a tinier portal somewhere in his world but he is shrunken and tiny.

Or the boy could be a character from different types of media. He could be a young canon or non-canon character from television shows, movies, video games, or literature.

To start this story off, the boy in question is...
1.title: Intro

choices: Exposure to Virus, Sickness, or Chemical
11.content:
A normal-sized boy is shrunken in a family filled with female relatives.

How did he shrink?

Science Experiment: The boy is shrunken down by an experimental shrinking procedure by a female member of his family, willingly or unwillingly. The procedure is either a test of that relative's shrinking device, or a test of a microscopic submarine designed to fly into other people's bodies. The boy might have also accidentally activated said shrinking device and burns out, leaving him permanently shrunken in his house.

Exposure to Virus, Sickness, or Chemical: The boy is shrunk down by an unknown agent. Whether a virus, sickness, or chemical, the exposure leaves him and possibly other boys his age an inch tall. He will have no one to rely on but his female relatives or any woman working where he contracted the shrinking agent, including his school or the hospital he's staying at.

Physical Genetic Disorder: The boy is born with "reversal pituitary glands" which shrinks his physical body as he grows older, including his muscles, organs, and skeleton. The boy will be shrunken down to the minimal size of 1 centimeter, but his glands will also be triggered by early stages of puberty and arousal, which is bad since some of his female relatives are either flirtatious or revealing.

-or-

Magical Spells: The boy is shrunken down by a magical spell. In one route, he is shrunken by a stage magician during one of her magic tricks and intends to keep him that way. In another route, the boy is the victim of an occult ritual overseen by his female relatives. In another route, he is cursed by a black magic gypsy that he accidentally angered. In another route, the boy finds a magic spellbook stashed away in his family's attic and read the Latin texts, shrinking him down.
11.title: Shrunken

111.content:
Brianna the Brainiac Big Sister

Character Bios:

Name: Tommy Winslow
Age: 10 years old
Eyes: Green
Hair: Brown
Height: 4' 10"
Weight: 116 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Tommy Winslow is the only son of Kelly Winslow, the younger brother of Lindsey and Brianna, and the older brother of Wendy. As a child, Tommy was doted on by his loving sister, Brianna, and initially volunteered to be the guinea pig for her experiments. As Tommy grew older, however, he realized that the side effects of Brianna's experiments have often humiliated him, thus making him cautious and distant from her. His cautious behavior has also turned hostile towards his brilliant sister.

Name: Brianna Winslow
Age: 16 years old
Eyes: Blue
Hair: Brown
Height: 5' 6"
Weight: 132 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Brianna Winslow is the second daughter of Kelly Winslow, the younger sister of Lindsey, and the older sister of Tommy and Wendy. Born with a gifted intelligence, Brianna consistently performed a variety of scientific experiments which some believed were years ahead of our time. Brianna constantly babies Tommy for being adorable and has often used him as the perfect guinea pig for her experiments. Her latest work with shrinking technology could open new avenues for the evolution of medical science. Most of her scientific experiments happen in the basement.

Name: Kelly Winslow
Age: 42 years old
Eyes: Brown
Hair: Light brown
Height: 6' 3"
Weight: 187 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Kelly Winslow is the mother of her daughters, Lindsey, Brianna, and Wendy, and her only son, Tommy. After a messy divorce following the discovery of her husband's cheating with his co-worker several years, Kelly acquired her children and the house and has long forgotten the incident. She loves and supports her children, but she is firm when it comes to the house rules. She works full-time at an office weekdays and returns home later in the afternoon, sometimes later on Friday evenings.

Name: Lindsey Winslow
Age: 21 years old
Eyes: Brown
Hair: Light brown
Height: 5' 9"
Weight: 172 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Lindsey Winslow is the eldest daughter of Kelly Winslow and the elder sister of Brianna, Tommy, and Wendy. As the eldest daughter, Lindsey sometimes takes command of the household while her mother is out working her catering business and is strict about the household rules. She goes to a nearby college where she's studying law practice and currently works part-time as a morning floor person at a pharamcy/convenience store.

Name: Wendy Winslow
Age: 9 years old
Eyes: Brown
Hair: Curly brown
Height: 3' 8"
Weight: 105 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Wendy is the youngest daughter of Kelly Winslow and the youngest sister of Lindsey, Brianna, and Tommy. The baby of the family, Wendy often pouts at the mention of being the little sister and often wishes to become bigger. Despite this, she loves her mom and her siblings dearly, especially Tommy since he often takes time out of his schedule to play with her. At her young age, Wendy is often curious and loves tiny creepy crawlies like ants, caterpillars, and spiders.

Main Story:
Being born the only boy in a household consisting of three sisters and a divorced mother is hard work for ten year-old Tommy Winslow. Being the little brother of a sixteen year-old sister with a high IQ and a genius scientific mindset is even harder work.

Tommy was always the subject of his sister, Brianna 's scientific experiments ever since he was six years old. Initially, Tommy enjoyed being the guinea pig to test out Brianna’s scientific prototypes that seemed like his own personal toys, like an artificially intelligent bed which spoke in their mother’s simulated voice, or a bubble wand which was designed for him to blow any bubbles in different shapes, sizes, and dimensions, apart from their typical spherical shape.

As he grew older, however, Tommy noticed how annoying Brianna was with her constant babying towards him and how dangerous her experiments had become. Experiments, such as an invisibility cloaking device that turned Tommy and his clothes invisible and a tonic to help increase his mental capacity, ended up having embarrassing flukes. The cloaking device ended up shortening and Tommy was visible again, but the cloaking device also ended up turning his clothes permanently invisible. The tonic ended up turning his skin a variety of wavy rainbow colors with brightly colored polka dots. In both instances, Tommy was exposed in front of his peers and was consistently laughed at, thereby labeling him the class outcast.

From that moment on, Tommy did all he could to avoid Brianna and her experiments. He often found protection in the form of his forty-three year-old mother, Kelly and his twenty-two year-old oldest sister, Lindsey, who forbade Brianna from further experimenting on him. Tommy’s nine year-old sister, Wendy even promised to hate Brianna forever if she ever did something so mean to him again. Yet, despite Tommy’s best efforts to avoid his scientifically-obsessed sister and Brianna’s word that she wouldn’t experiment on him without consent, she always found a way to get him to become the subject of her experiments. The last time she did, she slipped an orange powder inside Tommy’s orange juice designed to give him super speed, and it ended up energizing his speed to the point where he had no control over it for twelve hours. Brianna received a well-deserved scolding and punishment, but she privately vowed never to give up on her pursuit of scientific knowledge.

This time around, Brianna knew that she would make Tommy an offer he couldn’t refuse.

One day, after Tommy returned from school, he became vigilant of his surroundings, wary of her presence lingering around the house. As he stepped inside, he was suddenly tackled by a massive weight and crushed in Brianna’s signature overbearing bear hug. “Welcome home, little brother! Did you learn anything new and exciting today?” she asked in a sing-song voice.

“Brianna! Let go of me!” Tommy screamed as he tried to break free from his tormentor’s grasp.

“Noooo, I don’t wanna let you go! I wanna give you my signature big sister hugs n’ kisses!” Brianna nuzzled her cheek against Tommy’s cheek and gave him a big, wet smooch.

“Ewww, get off of me!”

Tommy broke his arms free and pushed his overbearing sister away from him. He then hopped on his toes and held his fists up like a sports boxer, straining the meanest look his facial muscles could produce, but that only made Brianna fawn over him even more. “Awww, look at you. You’re surrounded by girls who wanna kiss you and hug you, and you’re pushing them away and acting like a big strong man.” Brianna wiped a tear away and sniffled. “My little brother is becoming a man already. I’m so proud of you!”

“Leave me alone, Brianna!” Tommy shouted. “I know what you’re trying to do and it’s not working! I’m not letting you experiment on me again!”

“Awww, but testing my experiments has always been a fundamental part of our relationship,” Brianna whined, “and speaking of which, I have a new experiment that I’ve been working on as a personal pet project.”

“Go away, I don’t wanna hear about it!”

“But Tommy, hear me out at least!” Brianna begged the boy. “It’s a revolutionary invention that’ll solve the world’s hunger project and possibly medical science! It’s a shrinking radiation that I’ve been perfecting the past couple of weeks that allows anyone exposed to the radiation to safely shrink to the size of the bug, and it’s worked so far! I’ve been able to shrink organic fruit, my laboratory rats, and any nonorganic object that doesn’t hold any value, and nothing’s gone wrong so far! I only need a test subject to realize its success and I instantly thought of you, but...”

“No! I’m not going to get shrunken for your stupid brain!” Tommy screamed. “Why would I even want to test it out for you!?”

“Because it’s for the upcoming science exposition,” Brianna answered. “Plus, if you promise to help me out on this project, I’ll never bother you with my ‘loving big sister act’ again. I promise.”

The offer seemed shady, but the trade-off was just too tempting to pass up on.

What was Tommy’s answer?

1.) Tommy reluctantly, but willingly volunteers with the experiment.

2.) Tommy harshly rejects Brianna's offer, prompting her to forcibly drag him to her laboratory.

3.) Tommy harshly rejects Brianna's offer, but Brianna sends him down to the laboratory to retrieve something.
111.title: Science Experiment

choices: Pretty Fly For a Fly Boy
1112.content:
"No!" Tommy snapped, breaking away from Brianna's iron-tight embrace and staring her down with righteous fury in his eyes. "I said I don't want to be part of your stupid experiments again, but you don't listen! I'm sick of being your guinea pig, and I'm sick of you treating me like a little kid! No one wants to be friends with me because of your stupid experiments making me look like an idiot, and I'm sick of it! Stay away from me, Brianna! I hate your experiments, and I hate you!"

For a moment, Brianna looked physically hurt from her younger brother's rant, her heart broken, shattered, and stamped on. "I... I can't believe you just said that, Tommy. How could you say that, after all that we've been through together?" A tear ran down her cheek and her lips quivered from the internal hurt. All of a sudden, something snapped inside her, her quivering lips stretched and hardened into a growling frown, her brows furrowed deep. "You know what!? Fine! I tried being nice to you, Tommy, but forget it! You've really crossed the line here, Tommy!"

Tommy figured that he had let his temper go too far this time, but he figured too late as suddenly, his wrist was clamped in a tight, feminine fist, prompting him to yelp and squirm in her grasp. “OW! OW! OW! Brianna, what are you doing!? Let me go!" Tommy screamed, even louder as Brianna squeezed his wrist tighter. "Okay, okay, Brianna, I'm sorry!"

Brianna yanked Tommy closer to her, held him against her, and pressed her face into his to showcase her furious outrage towards him. "Shut up and listen, you little brat! I've had it up to here with your recent attitude towards me and my experiments! We used to be closer when we were younger, but now you're avoiding me and I don't appreciate it as much as I appreciate your contempt towards me and my experiments! If you really hate me that much, then forget being the loving big sister you need! Starting right now, I'll be the worst sister you'll ever have! I'll put you through the worst time of your life and then you'll be sorry you ever talked to me the way you did!"

The first thing Brianna did to prove her point was drag her little brother by the wrist, pulling him with so much force, it put him through physical agony. Tommy wriggled and squirmed in his sister's surprisingly strong grasp. There were tears leaking from his eyes as he tried to pry away her fingers tightly clamping his hand. "Brianna, please, let me go!" he begged and pleaded, which fell on deaf ears. "I'm sorry, okay!? Please stop tugging me like that! You're... you're hurting me...!"

Brianna kicked open the basement door and with her weaponized signature iron embrace, she hoisted the screaming, squirming ten year-old down the basement stairs. Tommy tried to kick her with his heels, but Brianna ignored those kicks, even as she threw him on the floor and dragged him further into the deeper area of her basement laboratory. The screaming and crying was eventually muffled by the insulation in the basement walls, so not even anyone who just arrived at the house could hear him now.

The laboratory was like any typical science lab, with white, sterilized floors and walls, chemistry sets with the stereotypical chemistry kit and distilleries, and scientific inventions that were years ahead of anyone else at Brianna's current teen years. Up ahead in a particular area was a special cylindrical chamber, outfitted on the inside with radiation-emitting lights, and a metallic bed with the leather straps on the railings. This was Brianna's latest experiment, and what better way of testing it now than using it to punish her defiant little brother.

The angered genius sister punched in a keycode, and the doors opened. Then she forced Tommy into the chamber, threw him onto the floor, and quickly hit the button to close the doors just as Tommy quickly recovered and bolted towards the closing door. "Brianna! Open this door!" Tommy shrieked, crying and slamming the thick glass with his palms desperately. "Please, Brianna, I'm sorry! I'll be a better brother, I promise! I'll take back everything I said, I'll volunteer as a guinea pig for your experiments, I'll do anything you want me to do! I promise I'll do whatever it is you want! Anything!"

In the midst of her entering a code within the keypad, Brianna suddenly stopped and turned to her poor, desperate brother with a deep loathing glare. "Really? You'll do anything I want? Even if what I want is disgusting, deplorable, and degrading?"

"Yes... yes, I'll do anything you want me to do! Please!" Tommy's face spread with a naïve grin, hoping that his negotiations would set him free.

"Alright, then here's the first thing I want you to do..." Brianna pushed a red button, and the chamber whirred to life. "...start screaming, and try not to move around too much."

Tommy's panic rose as the chamber's whirring grew louder and the radiation-emitting lights in the walls and under his feet flickered on. He could already fell the heat and the electricity running through his body, along with a new sense of fear. Suddenly, he found himself pounding the glass even harder and screaming even louder. "BRIANNA, OPEN THIS DOOR!" Tommy screamed bloody murder. "BRIANNA! LET ME OUT! HELP! MOMMY! WENDY! LINDSEY! SOMEONE HELP ME! DON'T LET BRIANNA DO THIS TO MEEEEEeeeeeee....!"

Tommy's pleas for help was drowned out as the machine's whirring reached their full volume, and then came a sudden blinding, flickering flash from within the glass. Then the chamber's mechanisms calmed down as the lights within flickered off, their function complete. Thick clouds of steam and smoke built up from within the chamber, obscuring Brianna's view of her test results. She immediately recalled, Schrödinger's cat, a famous thought experiment and paradox where a cat is placed in a sealed box with a radioactive sources and a flask of poison. The experiment dictated that the cat would be simultaneously dead and alive, but after opening the lid of the box, the cat would either be dead or alive.

Brianna didn't know if Tommy was dead, alive, or already felt the effects of her chamber inside. The most critical moment of this experiment came down to the push of the button. Brianna pushed the button and opened the chamber and released all the pent-up steam inside, either quickly dissipating or being ventilated to the outside via the ventilation system. Brianna stuck her head in, carefully observed the interior of the chamber, and found...

1.) Tommy had shrunken to the size of a grain of rice.
2.) Tommy became a human/fly hybrid after a young housefly flew inside the chamber with him.
3.) Tommy hasn't felt the effects of the scientific chamber (but will steadily shrink throughout the afternoon).
4.) Tommy hasn't felt the effects of the scientific chamber (but will steadily shrink throughout the night).
1112.title: Dragged to the Basement

11121.content:
Brianna watched the little speck of her little brother emerge out of the smoke, coughing and fanning away the fumes. He was the size of the game pieces from The Game of Life, extremely tiny. As Tommy emerged from the smoke, disoriented by the effects of the flashing lights, he stumbled forward and hit his face on something. He looked up and saw himself face-to-face the white tip of a Converse sneaker, part of the biggest pair of Converses he's ever seen.

Tommy trailed the shoes upward and screamed as the giant figure of Brianna loomed over him like a goddess. She looked like a living brown-haired colossus with a Hime cut hairstyle and big square glasses. Her black-and-white striped sweatpants stretched as high as the Gateway Arch, and her t-shirt was as enormous as a circus tent cover. If Tommy was normal sized, then Brianna would be an angry eighty foot giantess.

“What happened!? Why is everything so big!?” Tommy yelled.

“Everything didn't go big, you bug,” Brianna’s voice echoed above him. “You were just shrunk.”

Brianna squat down over Tommy’s tiny frame and reached down to pick up her bug-sized brother. The shrunken boy screamed and ran away from the oncoming pair of giant fingers reaching for him, but Brianna brought a building-sized finger into Tommy’s path, knocking him in the tummy and on the floor. Then she used both that finger and her thumb to pinch Tommy between them and lift him up. Tommy screamed and wriggled as he was brought up to the giantess’s face at the speed and feel of an elevator ride at a theme park, stopping to face her impassive face.

“P-Please, big sis, put me down!” Tommy begged.

"Why should I? You made me feel small by telling me you hate me, so I thought I'd return the favor by shrinking you down and putting you in your place. How does it feel to be small now?”

“Please!” Tommy screamed, tears leaking from his eyes.

Brianna sighed. “You know something, little bro? You’ve become a real bother to me ever since you started badmouthing my experiments. Sure, maybe there were a few unintended consequences along the way and maybe they were botched failures, but those were honest mistakes, and I never once received some sign of forgiveness from you for my honest mistakes.”

The giant genius swayed her hand back and forth, watching Tommy’s tiny limbs sway the same way. “Now that you’ve hurt my feelings, I think it’s appropriate that you receive a punishment fitting for your size,” the giantess declared like a goddess judging an impertinent mortal. “I think for your punishment, since you thought you could step all over me, I think I’ll put you on the ground and step all over you."

Brianna slipped her foot out of her Converse, and with her other foot, she gently opened up her sock from behind and revealed her wrinkled sole. She gently lowered Tommy down to the floor, and the screams and wriggling became louder and clearer.

“Hmm... no, I don’t think that’s appropriate enough,” Brianna said as she snapped the opening of the sock shut and brought Tommy back to her face. She playfully contemplated Tommy’s punishment and practically fluttered her finger at his face. “Perhaps since you being a little ass, I can put you in the back of my underwear and see if you survive being smothered by my butt.”

Brianna opened the waistline of her pants from behind and turned her body to reveal her underwear-clad behind to her shrunken brother. Self-conscious about her appearance, Brianna often wore lady’s briefs because her behind was nothing to how Lindsay’s behind was sexier than hers. She lowered the tiny Tommy to the opening, and like before, he screamed and wriggled, but this time he was close to crying.

“No, I think your punishment should be a little more humiliating,” Brianna said, bringing Tommy to her chest and holding her other hand over it. “You really broke my heart when you snapped at me like that, little bro. Since my heart is underneath my chest, I think I’ll smother you with my boobies.”

Using that other hand, she opened the collar of her shirt and brought the fearful Tommy to it. Before she could drop him in, a thought came to Brianna. “Actually, you might enjoy that too much, but I have a better idea,” she said, bringing Tommy up to her lips, instantly filling the boy with dread. “Since you chewed me out for being a bad sister, then maybe I should eat you. Yeah, eat you like a piece of meat, savor you like a piece of candy, and then when you down my throat, you’ll end up as a part of your big sister’s meal.”

Brianna parted her lips and opened them wide enough for Tommy to get a look at his possible new and final destination. A gust of hot, muggy breath washed over his entire body. Her somewhat yellow teeth framed the dark interior of her moist maw, her tongue wriggling in anticipation, her throat beckoning her to drop him down and swallow him.

Closing her mouth with a grin, Brianna curled her fingers around Tommy and constricted him in her fist. “Well, little bro, I’m not really sure how to carry out your punishment,” the giantess confessed to the poor young tiny. “Should I crush you underneath my feet, smother you with my butt, squish you in my boobies, or swallow you whole like a little piece of food?”

What happens next?

1.) Brianna puts Tommy on the ground; she intends to stomp him!
2.) Brianna puts Tommy in the backside of her underwear; she intends to smother him!
3.) Brianna puts Tommy in her cleavage; she intends to suffocate him!
4.) Brianna puts Tommy in her mouth; she intends to swallow him!
11121.title: The Very Little Brother

111211.content:
Brianna stared impassively at the tiny form of her little brother compacted inside her tight fist. Tommy struggled in her grip, wriggling and begging his bigger sister to release him from her grip. As she observed his actions, she couldn't help but notice how pathetic he was for acting like a big man, blowing up at her for the accidental side effects he endured from her experiments, as honest of mistakes as they were.

Now Tommy was in his giant sister's grip while she contemplated the best way to punish him. Shrinking him to the size of an insect against his will was only the first part of his punishment. She presented Tommy the many options of how she would shame him, humiliate him, make him feel so little like how younger siblings should feel in the grand scheme of sibling relationships.

That's when an idea coursed through her head.

Brianna shifted her hand so Tommy was pinched in between her fingers and brought him to her face, ready to pass her judgment. "You know, Tommy, I believe I have the perfect punishment for a little bug like you," she said, the proximity of her enormous mouth and her booming voice making Tommy nervous, "and since you're the size of a bug, it's only fitting that I crush you like the bug you are. To that end, you're going to be crushed underneath my feet."

"No! Brianna, no!" Tommy screamed, but Brianna wouldn't hear it.

The intelligent giantess separated her fingers, and Tommy was sent plummeting all the way to the hard tile floor. His terrorized shrieking was so small to Brianna, it could've been barely heard from across the laboratory. The shrieking stopped when Tommy felt the impact of the floor, knocking his breath out and leaving him in absolute agony.

The shrunken boy whimpered and choked as he struggled to crawl away from his giant big sister, like a bug who had its limbs pulled off and was crawled at a similar speed. A couple of resounding thunderous booms echoed behind him, and a shadow loomed over him. When he turned around to look, he barely had enough strength to scream as he stared at the incoming sole of Brianna's...

1.) ...Converse sneaker.
2.) ...socked foot.
3.) ...bare foot.
111211.title: Sole Sister

111214.content:
Brianna stared impassively at the tiny form of her little brother compacted inside her tight fist. Tommy struggled in her grip, wriggling and begging his bigger sister to release him from her grip. As she observed his actions, she couldn't help but notice how pathetic he was for acting like a big man, blowing up at her for the accidental side effects he endured from her experiments, as honest of mistakes as they were.

Now Tommy was in his giant sister's grip while she contemplated the best way to punish him. Shrinking him to the size of an insect against his will was only the first part of his punishment. She presented Tommy the many options of how she would shame him, humiliate him, make him feel so little like how younger siblings should feel in the grand scheme of sibling relationships.

That's when an idea coursed through her head.

Brianna shifted her hand so Tommy was pinched in between her fingers and brought him to her face, ready to pass her judgment. "You know, Tommy, I believe I have the perfect punishment for a little bug like you," she said, the proximity of her enormous mouth and her booming voice making Tommy nervous, "and I couldn't help but notice you're approximately the size of a grain. And do you know what happens to grain, little bug?"

Brianna lifted Tommy up over her face and licked her teeth. "They get eaten, of course, and now you're a little speck of grain yourself.."

The nerdy giantess opened her maw wide enough for Tommy to get a good look at his next destination. At this, Tommy screamed, cried, and thrashed around in Brianna’s grip, sobbing hysterically while his pleas to his giant sister to let him go and not eat him fell on deaf ears. Brianna slowly wiggled her tongue and ran outwards across the bottom of her lip, washing Tommy with a hot wave of bad breath.

"This is what's gonna happen, you pathetic bug. I'm gonna gently drop you in my mouth, onto my outstretched tongue, and quickly close you off from the world behind my teeth and my lips...” Brianna licked her chops, brought Tommy to her wide open maw and clamping her teeth close to his feet, making him cry out fearfully. . “...and once you’re fully inside my mouth, I’m gonna roll you across my tongue and savor you like a nice piece of candy.”

Brianna smacked her lips repeatedly, imitating the sexual way for a woman to savor their food like a connoisseur. “Then, once I collect all the flavor of your tiny body, and your flavor becomes tasteless...” Brianna lifted her head up and revealed her neck to Tommy, her neck pulsing as she swallowed deeply, moaning deeply, and tracing her finger down her throat.

“You’re gonna wriggle and squirm down my esophagus as my throat muscles deep into my body, and deeper, and deeper, until you finally reach my stomach.” Brianna moved her hand down to her abdomen and gently rubbed it in circles. “I can practically feel you falling into my hot stomach acids already. I imagine it’ll feel like falling into a hot tub with your invulnerability, surrounded by pulsing, gurgling flesh, and listening to my body’s other functions. You’ll probably squirm around and pound on my stomach and begging me to let you out, but all I’ll feel is a slight tickle coming from my tummy.”

Brianna ceased her tummy rubbing and gently smacked it, turning to her scared little brother in her fingers with a sly smile on her face. Tommy’s face contorted in fear as tears poured from his eyes. “Please, big sis, I’m sorry I was so mean to you! I’ll be a better little brother for you, but please don’t eat me! I don’t wanna be food!”

Brianna scoffed. "To me, that’s all you are right now: a little piece of food who should know better than to bite back at your big sister.”

She stuck out her tongue and wiggled the tip across Tommy’s face, smothering both sides of his face with saliva. The egg-headed giantess brought her tongue back into her mouth and smacked it, collecting her tiny brother’s flavor, savoring it before she gently swallowed it.

“Mmmm... you have a nice salty caramel flavor with extra sea salt. Perfect for a little badmouth like yourself. And speaking of badmouth...” Brianna shifted her hand so she was pinching the back of Tommy’s shirt and lifted him up over her raised head. “It’s time for you to take a nice long time-out inside your big sister’s stomach. Don’t worry, I’ll be sure to let you out... in about eight hours...”

With one last waft of hot breath, Brianna opened her mouth and eagerly lolled her tongue from over her bottom lip. Tommy screamed the loudest scream he could ever scream as he was tangled above Brianna’s giant mouth, intent on dropping him inside and swallowing him, trapping him inside the darkness of her belly. Brianna gently lowered him to the center of her spongy bubblegum tongue.

What happens next?

1.) Brianna savors Tommy and swallows him whole.
2.) Brianna spits Tommy out of her mouth; she has other plans.
3.) Someone enters the basement laboratory and interrupts Brianna.
111214.title: Badmouths Deserve a Bad Mouth

choices: A Permanent Stay Inside His Sister's Stomach
1112141.content:
Brianna gently lowered her tiny little brother to her maw and gently dropped him in the middle of her tongue. After the taste of salty caramel touched her taste buds, Brianna slurped up little Tommy into her mouth and began to rub her tongue all over him.

In the darkness of her humid maw, Tommy screamed and kicked against the defiant serpent that was his big sister’s tongue. Brianna’s jaws moved in motion as the giant spongy tasting muscle slathered Tommy in saliva, choking on some that flowed down his throat. He already felt sick to his stomach from the saliva, and the motions weren’t helping. Tommy tried to resist, but the combination of the saliva, Brianna’s undulating tongue, and the movement of her jaws caused him to slip onto his belly, making him wail even harder.

On the outside of her maw, Brianna was savoring the flavor her little brother gave off, making her moan pleasurably. She rolled the tiny shrunken brother around the inside of her mouth like a fine caramel candy, sucking up all of the flavor he could produce. “Mmmmhhh... oh yeah... so good...” Brianna moaned as she smacked her lips. “I gotta say, Tommy, you might be the tastiest snack I’ve ever tasted before. Kinda makes me wish I didn’t have to swallow you, but... mmmhhh… aaahhhh….”

The very thought of the inevitable moment when Brianna would send Tommy down her throat jolted her nerves pleasurably. On the inside, Tommy heard every word his giant voracious sister said like a dank food chewing and swallowing ASMR video. Her amplified voice pounded in his ears and into his head. What was worse was the implications of what she would do to him. As Tommy attempted to resist Brianna’s tongue, the giant muscle pressed him against the roof of her mouth, taking in the ticklish feeling of his squirming and collecting his flavor. The tongue dragged him towards the clamping teeth, around the molar section where it threatened to compact his tiny body into paste.

Tommy quickly rolled away as his colossal sister’s jaws clamped onto his shirt, ripping it from both the force of her chewing and the tension caused by the clamping and Tommy’s roll. The tiny boy was left without a shirt on, half-naked inside his sister’s mouth, whose tongue suddenly went into overdrive as it picked up on his added flavor.

“Mmmmmm... you know, I think you taste better without the shirt on,” Brianna said, tapping a finger on her chin as she carefully noted the added salty caramel taste to her tongue. “Don’t worry, little brother, I’m not gonna strip your pants. That would just be wrong, and a mighty giantess like myself needs to have standards, you know.”

Saliva continued to build up inside the cage of Brianna's mouth. To Tommy’s perspective, it was like filling in the shallow part of a large swimming pool with disgusting mouth liquid and was beginning to drown in it. Brianna began to slurp and slosh him around with the saliva casually, not caring one bit about his well-being rather his taste and his size. She felt a tickle at her lips as Tommy’s hand stuck out between them, but she slurped it up like a spaghetti noodle.

“You wanna see the outside world one last time, Tommy?” Brianna asked. “I think you should. Fair warning, it’s gonna be the last time you're gonna see the light of day before I swallow you down.” Suddenly, the auburn-haired giantess opened up her mouth, revealing the tiny boy splashing around in a small pool of warm, stagnant froth. His eyes squinted as he saw the lights of the basement shining inside and anything beyond his giant sister’s lips momentarily.

“It’s time to go down, Tommy,” Brianna informed, making the tiny boy in her mouth freeze. “It’s gonna be a long stay for you, little brother... but don’t worry, you’ll get out eventually. After all, there’s no better place for you to stay than on the inside of my body.”

Just as Tommy tried to crawl from the pool and onto the tongue, Brianna unceremoniously clamped her mouth shut. She swirled her tiny brother around with her collected spit a couple of times, tilted her head back, and with a swallow, dumped everything in her mouth down her esophagus. She gave another swallow to feel a certain squirming bulk travel down her throat.

“Oh there you are... I can feel you going down... down... down... just like I promised.”

On the inside, Tommy screamed and squirmed as he was spilled and squeezed down a long, fleshy tube heading downwards and deeper into darkness. The wet peristalsis pushed him along with the torrent of slacks as it drained deeper into Brianna’s digestive system. From outside, the screaming young tiny felt a pair of fingers push up against the esophagus, slowing down his descent as the giantess moaned to the sensation of him squirming her throat.

After five seconds of terror, Tommy’s descent came to a close when he felt a tight construction traveling up his body from his feet to his chest, holding him as his legs flailed in midair. The tight sphincter gradually pulled the tiny boy through, and he fell three stories into a dark, stuffy, humid sac of flesh and dropped into a shallow lake of bubbling hot liquid. Tommy quickly surfaced and swam towards the nearest incline where he couldn’t touch the stagnant stomach acids, flopped down on the floor, and wailed bloody murder.

“Ah, there you are. I thought I could feel a little squirming in there,” Brianna taunted as she gently rubbed her abdominal area and smacked it, creating lots of turbulence for her tiny brother. “So how does it feel to be trapped inside your big sister’s stomach? Is it dark? Is it humid? I bet the stomach acids feel like a boiling hot jacuzzi, but I can also bet you didn’t feel your skin corroding from the acids because of the effects of my shrinking chamber.”

Panic overtook Tommy as he quickly crawled over to the stomach wall and started pounding on the fleshy surface. “Brianna, please let me out! I’m sorry! I don’t wanna be food!”

The entire stomach jolted as Brianna keeled over, chuckling at the ticklish sensations against her stomach walls, clutching her belly. “Oh, that does tickle! It’s just as I imagined it!” she chuckled as she went back to rubbing her belly. “Mmmhh... you feel good inside of me, little brother. Now you’re gonna stay inside of me for the rest of the night... but don’t worry, you’ll be able to have your dinner soon... when it reaches my stomach that is.”

Tommy screamed, begged, and cried to Brianna to let him out of her stomach, but underneath the heart pumping and the stomach grumbling to its newest occupant, she couldn’t hear him. He tried to punch and hit the stomach walls, but they came across as a tickle to Brianna’s size. Devoid of all hope of escape, Tommy curled up and cried against the stomach floors. He had to maintain himself against the movements of the stomach as Brianna moved about the house, satisfied that she sealed her only brother away inside of her body.

What happens next?

1.) Skip to the evening with Brianna having dinner with her family.
2.) Skip to the night with Brianna sleeping and Tommy trying to escape her digestive system.
3.) Skip to the next morning with Brianna releasing Tommy from her bowels.
4.) Brianna goes back on her word and decides to keep Tommy inside her stomach forever.
1112141.title: Tommy's Tummy Time-Out

112.content:
A normal-sized boy is shrunken by exposure to an agent or a chemical.

Which of these scenarios will apply to the shrunken boy?

A Virus/Sickness: The boy(s) contract an infectious agent which shrinks them down to one inch tall. In the virus routes, a group of feminine radicals steal a container containing a shrinking pathogen which shrinks anyone with an XY chromosome when inhaled, and it's a self-sustaining virus in the air until the heat from its host's body slowly kills them. In the sickness route, the boy gets sick after eating an undercooked convenience store cheeseburger and his body has a reaction which shrinks him down. In any given scenario, the boy(s) must survive their puny plight while remaining shrunken with the females in their lives.

A Chemical: The boy(s) are exposed to a dangerous mix of chemicals which shrinks them down to one inch tall. In one scenario, the boy accidentally consumes a chemical mixture made by his scientist neighbor mistaking it for medicine, and he shrinks down to size. In another scenario, a dangerous mixture of chemicals in a school laboratory causes the boys to shrink from inhaling the thick colorful clouds.
112.title: Exposure to Virus, Sickness, or Chemical

1121.content:
A normal-sized boy is shrunken by exposure to an infectious agent.

Which of these scenarios will apply to the shrunken boy?

A Worldwide Pandemic: A terrorist group of feminine radicals break into a top secret laboratory and steals a container sealing an experimental shrinking pathogen. The female terrorists take the virus to the top of the tallest building in the city and releases it, allowing the self-sustaining, multiplying airborne virus spread all over the city and beyond. The virus shrinks any person with an XY chromosome to a one-inch size, and that includes all of the younger boys who unfortunately contracted the virus!

Food Poisoning: During a stop at a gas station convenience store, the boy eats an undercooked, infected cheeseburger which makes him physically sick. The boy's body starts reacting by shrinking him down to size, and must rely on his female family members to help the poor boy out.
1121.title: A Virus/Sickness

choices: A Playground Full of Bug Boys
Our World Revolves Our Shrunken Children
11211.content:
The year is 20XX, and a secret terrorist organization called FEMME, a female-only radicals dedicated to destroying the destructive influence of men all over the world, finally make their move. To do this, members of FEMME kidnapped a brilliant virologist, held his family hostage, and forced him to finish the formula for a genetically altered self-sustaining virus which, when inhaled, mimics the cold and flu symptoms. The virus affected the XY genes only, so once the contagion is inhaled and metabolized, the male host is shrunken down to an inch tall which has no cure or antidote for the affected victims, since the virus dies from body heat when inhaled to avoid tracing.

Once the viral agent was completed after two weeks of forced labor, the secret leader of FEMME personally tested the virus on the virologist and one of her loyal henchwomen. Needless to say, the virus worked like a success, as the affected FEMME member only suffered flu-like symptoms, but the virologist was shrunken out of his clothes. Despite the virologist's please to be released, the leader of FEMME made his family watch via livestreaming as she took her boot and squashed him flat under her boot. She made sure the virologist's wife and daughter saw the mess he made on the bottom of her boot.

An hour later, FEMME dragged the virus container up the tallest tower of the city, which they took at gunpoint. After an elevator ride to the top and a couple flights of stairs, the FEMME members brought the virus to the top of the tower where the wind blew in different directions. It was the perfect place to spread a worldwide pandemic which spelt the end of man's rule over the world as they spoke. Just as the police arrived on the scene, the FEMME leader personally twisted the cap off and released a purple cloud into the air, which instantly turned colorless upon oxidation.

The colorless cloud was carried in all directions of the wind, self-sustaining in the air, descending onto the police and citizens in the street down below. When the police showed up at the top of the building, the leader of FEMME quickly pointed the virus at the officers. In a matter of a few seconds, the officers felt this strong urge to cough. Their throats became scratchy, their muscles ached, and their fever ran past 100 degrees Fahrenheit. Finally, they felt their clothes loosen like an inflatable after the air was being sucked out as their entire world grew bigger and bigger.

Once the virus' purpose was fulfilled, the police officers stood among their discarded clothing in the nude. The leader of FEMME watched with sick satisfaction at the sight. With just a few steps, she stood tall over the cowardly men who screamed at her sudden stature. She took the same boot that killed the virologist and stamped the two officers dead amongst their clothing.

Now as the FEMME leader laughed triumphantly at her success, the virus spread all over the city, secretly inhaled through the lungs and dying from the host's body heat. The women in the streets only felt the sudden case of the flu, but they would still be physically okay compared to the grisly fate the men suffered that day. The men began to shrink, causing vehicles to crash, while the other men met their demise in the bellies of the giant animals who saw them as food. FEMME considered this a red letter day to all the world governed by men's greed, pride, and weakness.

What FEMME also counted on was the male children shrinking from the effects of the virus. The self-sustaining virus was carried throughout the four winds over the city and into different counties and cities beyond the limits. The virus was designed to find a suitable host to die in, and an XY chromosome carrier to shrink. It didn't care what age they had the chromosome, they would all be shrunken this day.

After a few hours, the virus cloud found itself drifting towards an area where the children were unfortunately present when itself caught in the line of fire. The only question is, where did the virus affect the children?

A school district (i.e. a kindergarten, elementary school, middle school, high school)

A playground (i.e. an outdoor park, a Chuck E. Cheese, an amusement park, etc.)

A children's hospital

-or-

A school field trip (i.e. in the city, in a museum, in the red-light district, etc.)
11211.title: A Worldwide Pandemic

112111.content:
The airborne virus was carried far away by the breeze, some of the virus already scattered along to the city below and starting to take effect. This particular breeze carried some of the virus towards another county, right over a small town known for its school district. The district consisted of a kindergarten, an elementary school, and a middle school merged with the high school in the same building. The one thing that connected these buildings were the large fields, the playgrounds, the baseball diamond, the soccer field, and the track.

It was this time in the late morning when the wind guided the virus towards the kindergarten and into an open window where the children were currently playing with their toys, watched over by their female teachers. At the elementary school, the children were playing on the playground during recess, giving their bodies the energy to build up their appetite. In the middle school and high school building, the students of the former were eating their lunches while the students of the latter were sitting in class and listening to the teacher drone on and on about their lecture.

Today, these students would share one thing in common: their contraction of the virus. The shrinking pathogen would linger about in the air, getting sucked into their hosts, and carried into their circulatory systems. The girls would only feel dizziness, muscle aches, and a dry cough, but they wouldn't be totally affected by the virus one-hundred percent, since the virus wasn't designed to disrupt the XX chromosome. The boys, however, are a different story altogether. Once the virus penetrates their circulatory system, they'll be reduced to an inch tall, and it would be pandemonium for the boys.

The only question is, which school will you choose to follow?

The Kindergarten

The Elementary School

The Middle School

-or-

The High School
112111.title: A Schoolwide Pandemic

1122.content:
A normal-sized boy is shrunken by exposure to a chemical.

Which of these scenarios will apply to the shrunken boy?

Mistaken for Medicine: The boy visits his female scientist neighbor who gives him a small bottle of shrinking tonic, but he catches the cold and the flu. The boy's mother accidentally feeds him his shrinking tonic, mistaking it for cold and flu medicine, and as a result, the boy is shrunken down in his own bed. Things get worse since the boy's mother is often ditzy and oblivious.

A Cloudy School Day: A school's science class learns from their female teacher how to properly mix chemicals, but a couple of boys in her class attempt to pull a prank on their shy, nerdy classmate by sneaking in a different chemical into the mixture with disastrous results. The improper mix of chemicals created a cloud which quickly covered all of the school and shrunk all of the boys in the school, leaving them at the mercy of the giant females.
1122.title: A Chemical

11221.content:
Character Bios

Name: Anthony “Tony” Sawyer
Age: 6
Eyes: Brown
Hair: Black
Height: 3’7
Weight: 60
Ethnicity: Caucasian
Backstory: Being the youngest and smallest member of his family has never been easy for Tony Sawyer. While not enjoying time with his video games and action figures, he is navigating a household where his mother and older sister loom large over him. While Tony appreciates the love he receives from his family and loves them in return, he is tired of the affection constantly heaped upon him, and dreams of the day he is big enough to put an end to it. An experimental size-altering chemical has the potential to turn the tables on his overly adoring family - if he can just make sure he can get it to them without a hitch.

Name: Betty Ann Sawyer
Age: 34
Eyes: Green
Hair: Brown
Height: 6’5
Weight: 170
Ethnicity: Caucasian
Backstory: The mother of Megan and Tony, Betty Ann has been devoted to her children since day one, and, following the death of her husband, has thrown herself into raising them. In spite of this tragedy, she remains cheerful and positive, keeping an upbeat look on life. She supports the family by running a small dance studio, working closely with Megan, and sometimes “volunteering” Tony as a mostly unwitting dance partner. Betty Ann tries to spend any spare time she has with her children, playing dolls with Megan or action figures with Tony (and her whimsical side occasionally finds her playing with their toys by herself when they are out of the room). She loves showering her children with hugs, kisses and physical affection, particularly Tony, whom she does not want to believe is growing up, and is inclined to mother him constantly, over his objections. Despite her kind, loving nature, Betty Ann is not particularly bright, and is a bit of a klutz. Her ditziness sometimes results in her inability to pick up minor details about things going on around her - like one of her children shrinking down to 3 inches tall.

Name: Megan Sawyer
Age: 9
Eyes: Blue
Hair: Red
Height: 5’3
Weight: 110
Ethnicity: Caucasian
Backstory: Tony’s older sister, who sees her little brother as her constant playmate, whether he’s willing or not. Megan takes after her mother in both size and personality, often joining her in smothering Tony with love. Spare time finds her practicing ballet or playing with dolls, and trying to convince Tony to do the same.

Name: Dr. Lucy Leonhardt
Age: 29
Eyes: Blue
Hair: Blonde
Height: 5’8
Weight: 125
Ethnicity: Caucasian
Backstory: The Sawyers’ eccentric but kind next-door neighbor, Dr. Leonhardt has invented numerous gadgets and formulas allowing humans to do extraordinary and dangerous things. Dr. Leonhardt is fond of Tony, and often gives him samples of her creations to use at home. While working, she tends to tune out the world and ignore anyone who may enter her laboratory.

“At last! It is finished!”

Dr. Lucy Leonhardt reaches into the chamber and extracts a small blue bottle. On a nearby table, 6-year-old Tony Sawyer watches excitedly. Tony is a frequent visitor to Dr. Leonhardt’s basement laboratory, as the young scientist has produced a wide array of inventions and chemicals that allow humans to perform incredible feats. The best part is, she will often give him samples to take home and test out. At various times, she has allowed him to fly, become invisible, and break the sound barrier while running. Dr. Leonhardt holds her latest concoction triumphantly.

“This,” she announces, “is the world’s only known shrinking formula. Not only will it shrink the drinker down, but while in effect, they will be nearly immortal.”

“You mean,” Tony asked, “that if you use that stuff to shrink, nothing can hurt you?”

“Not quite,” Dr. Leonhardt explained. “There are very few things that would be fatal, but my experiments have shown that the user can still very much feel pain. When I was testing it the other day, a bowling ball rolled over into me. I didn’t suffer any permanent damage, but it did hurt to the point I wished I was dead.” Sensing the excitement on Tony’s face, Dr. Leonhardt hands him the bottle, and answers the unasked question. “I can let you have this sample,” she tells him, “but you have to be careful with this. The formula is very volatile. A few drops can shrink you down to a matter of inches. And while I can make this chemical easily, it takes a while to make the antidote. That won’t be ready for at least a few days.” Tony thanks her and hurried out of the laboratory towards his house.

Tony steps through the door of his house and into the hall, hoping to make it to his room in peace. If he is quiet enough, he may be spared the overbearing ritual that usually accompanies his arrival. The cream of a floorboard stops him in his tracks, and as Tony looks up, the sight of a pink-clad streak bearing down on him dashes his hopes of a quiet arrival. With a shriek of delight, Tony’s older sister Megan leaps and levels her brother with a flying tackle, trapping him under her full weight. “Hi, Tony,” she calls out happily. “How’s my favorite little brother doing?”

Tony struggles to escape his big sister’s iron grip. For a girly girl who lives for ballet and dolls, Megan possesses a fair amount of physical strength. Sibling rivalry in the Sawyer house is practically nonexistent; in fact, Tony wishes his sister would argue and fight every now and then instead of the persistent hugs and forceful drafting of him into her girly games. He finally manages to struggle free, and marches off, trying to catch his breath. If he wanted to be greeted this way every day, his mother should let him get a dog - it would at least have a higher IQ. Tony sets off on his way once again, only to freeze in dread when Mega’s voice again cuts the air.

“MOM! TONY’S HOME!”

The ground begins to rumble, and Tony sees an even more imposing figure barreling down on him: his mother, Betty Ann Sawyer. With no time to dodge or escape, he can only brace for impact.

“There‘s my little boy,” she announces as she grabs her son, And lifts him effortlessly into the air before pressing him into her chest. “Did you have a good day today?”

“Mmph! Grrrgle! Mrrrm!” was all Tony could manage. Almost everything about his mother was big: big eyes, big lips, big hands, big feet, big bosom, big hips, big butt, and big heart. The only exception was her tiny brain. Betty Ann finally releases her grip, allowing Tony to fall to the floor, gasping and panting for air.

Tony finally reaches his bedroom, still sore from the hugs he received moments earlier. As he sets the vial of shrinking formula on his nightstand, he knows how he’s going to use it. While he loves his mother and sister very much, and appreciates the love they have for him, he is fed up with it coming in such powerful ways. Now he can play his video games without being dragged off for a tea party. Now he can take a shower on his own instead of his mom giving him a bath. Now he can have a break from bone-crushing hugs and slobbering kisses. Now he will be the big man in the house. Tony trudges downstairs to dinner, pondering how best to shrink his family.

That night, as Tony sits in front of the TV, still mulling his strategy over, he begins to feel light-headed. The feeling soon cascades to his entire body, and he tries to stand up, only to collapse to the floor, his strength completely sapped. Betty Ann, maternal instincts in full gear, races over and feels Tony’s forehead.

“Oh, my poor baby,” she declares. “Looks like you have a fever. Come on, Mister, it’s straight into bed with you.” Betty Ann lifts Tony up and carries him to his room. She ventures to the medicine cabinet and returns to Tony’s room with a small blue bottle of medicine. “Now just take a little of this,” she instructs, giving her son a few spoonfuls of the liquid, “And you should feel better in the morning.” She kisses Tony good night and leaves him to fall asleep.

The next morning, as Tony opens his eyes and sits up, he sees his door open and Betty Ann walk into the room, with Megan bounding in behind her. “How’s Mommy’s little angel doing today?” she asks sweetly.

“A lot better today, Mom,” Tony replies. “I don’t even feel anything anymore.”

“That’s good,” Betty Ann says. You must have just had a 24-hour flu. Still, you should probably take a little more medicine just to be sure. Megan, honey, can you hand me the medicine bottle? It’s over there on the nightstand.”

“Okay, Mom,” Megan answers, as she reaches behind her to grab the bottle off the nightstand. She hands it to her mother, who gives Tony a liberal helping of the liquid. When she finishes and they exit the room, Tony smiles evilly as he picks up his bottle off the nightstand, invigorated and ready to put his plan into action. He turns the bottle over in his hand, only to gasp in horror when he reads the label:

COLD AND FLU MEDICINE

The realization hits Tony instantly. “That means,” he mutters to himself, “the bottle that Megan grabbed...the stuff Mom poured down my throat...that was....”

Tony feels himself falling back down into his mattress, as walls, bookshelves and pillows stretch up to tower over him. When everything finally stops, Tony glances over to his dresser, to estimate that he is about half the size of the Transformer action figure on his dresser. He estimated his size to be that of Megan’s doll children.

The room begins to shake and thunderous noise that Tony quickly recognizes as footsteps approaches. The door opens and in comes...
11221.title: Mommy, You Shrunk the Boy

choices: She sees him...but doesn’t notice he’s shrunk
112211.content:
As if stepping from an interdimensional portal into this world, a colossal creature appears in the now-cavernous doorway. Tony can only watch in amazement and horror as the monstrous being crosses the room, a terrific *BOOM!* and a mighty tremor heralding each footstep. Tony had always liked kaiju movies, and delighted in seeing gigantic monsters level a city as people fled in terror. But while he enjoyed this experience on screen, he never would have imagined that he would live through it, especially not in his own house. And he would have imagined even less just what type of enormous beast he would end up staring down. This was no mutant lizard or titanic alien conqueror, but the mountainous menace is something both freakishly imposing and incredulously familiar.

It’s terrifying...

It’s humongous...

It’s blood-curdling...

“IT’S MOMMY!”

The voice, at once a thundering boom and a cheerful sing-song, left Tony no doubts as to the identity of the colossal intruder. He stands transfixed on his bed as his overgrown mother lumbers towards him, with a smile that is at once lovingly sweet and blissfully ignorant.

“Yoo-hoo! Mommy’s back!” Betty Ann calls out as she approaches her son’s bed. “Tony? Honey? Where are you?” She begins to look around quizzically when she doesn’t see or hear him, unaware that she is in fact looming over her now-miniaturized child at that very moment. As she paces around searching for her little boy, Tony frantically tries to catch her attention from below.

“Mom! Mom! Down here!” Tony yells, struggling to maintain his balance over the trembling of his mother’s footsteps. As Betty Ann walked, Tony realized that she was not looking down, and was not noticing where her enormous feet were landing. He breathed a sigh of relief that he was safe on his bed...for now. Although his voice was not powerful enough to attract his mom’s attention, he continued to jump up and down and flail his arms in a desperate effort to catch her eye.

Whether through Tony’s efforts or by sheer luck, Betty Ann eventually makes her way back to Tony’s bedside, continuing to look for her son. “Tony? Tony? Are you in here?” she wonders as she looks down towards the bed. Tony stares up and waves at the giant woman, hoping against hope that he managed to attract her attention.
112211.title: Fe... Fi... Fo...MOM!

choices: He is taken downstairs for some food
Betty Ann decides to give him some more medicine
1122111.content:
*BOOM!* *BOOM!* *BOOM!* *BOOM!*

The room quakes uncontrollably as Betty Ann makes her way toward her shrunken son, the powerful rumbling finally ceasing as she reaches the bed. Tony stares directly upwards tracking the form of his Statue of Liberty - sized mother for what seemed like an eternity. Betty Ann casts her gaze down, and Tony once more begins jumping and screaming, begging that he ends up in the protection of his loving mother before the dangers of the shrunken world overtake him.

Tony’s prayers are soon answered when his mom’s gigantic head lowers to his level, her eyes settling on him. “Tony,” her sweet voice thunders, “There you are.” She looks her son over, a quizzical expression of concern on her face. “Sweetheart,” she intones, “Something’s wrong. What is going on?”

“Uh, you see...” Tony stutters, trying time find where to start, Dr. Leonhardt next door...she gave me this chemical...when you gave me my medicine, I...”

“My goodness, I see it now,” Betty Ann cuts him off. “Mommy hasn’t had her good morning kiss yet.”

Tony stares incredulously. “A kiss? Mom, look at me. There’s no way you can...*urk!*“

Tony’s pleading is cut short when a huge, pale hand wraps around his body, squeezing him with unbearable force. He is soon whizzing through the air, into the path of an enormous pair of lips that crash into the side of his tiny face. The noise echoes around his ears, and the sensation is one of his face being pulled off by the world’s most powerful suction device. Both seem to last forever, until the lips finally release their hold, and Tony falls back into the palm of his mother’s hand.

“Mom, what are you doing?” Tony snaps angrily, dizzy and covered in lipstick and Mom-spittle. “Can’t you see how small I am now?”

“Yes, of course I do,” Betty Ann answers. “You’re Mommy’s little baby boy. And I love you so, so much.”

Tony cannot believe what he just heard. His mom didn’t even notice he had shrunk, despite the fact that he was STANDING in the PALM of her HAND. All this dumb woman could think about was mothering him. And then her next words, while ordinarily evoking annoyance and leading to well-meaning discomfort, now filled him with sheer terror and fear for his life: “And now Mommy’s little boy is going to get a big hug!”

“A...hug?!?” Tony stammers. “No, Mom, no! Please not a...” his pleas are cut short as Betty Ann slams him hard against her chest. Betty Ann sighs lovingly as she cuddles her son, failing to notice the tiny pair of feet thrashing vainly beneath her fingers, the only part of his body that was otherwise visible.

Trapped in her grip, Tony is left at the mercy of his oblivious mother. Failing to notice her son’s diminished size, she applies the same strength she uses that Tony finds excessive at his normal size. Now he is stuck between her hand and her bosom, not sure if the unbearable heat or the unrelenting pressure would finish him first. Finally Betty Ann releases her grip in her usual way: by opening up her arms and allowing him to plummet to the floor. Fortunately he was able to land on the mattress, lessening the height of the fall and providing a soft landing surface. As Tony pulls himself back to his feet, once again staring up at his behemoth of a mom.

“Are you sure you’re feeling better, honey?” Betty Ann asks. “Here, let me feel your forehead.” Tony prepares to implore her to notice his situation and act accordingly by gently sending down a single finger. But before a single word can escape his mouth, an immense object blankets him in shadow. Seconds later, his entire body is mashed under his mother’s hand. He is instantly wracked with intense pain, with the sound and sensation of every bone in his body cracking. When she lifts her hand back up, he feels his bones resetting, sits up to discover that like Dr. Leonhardt with her bowling ball, he is unharmed, though in immense pain.

“You’re still a little warm,” Betty Ann muses. Tony struggles to tell her that it was because of the body heat from when she nearly suffocated him moments earlier. “But don’t worry, sweetie, I’ll take care of you all day.”

After being crushed twice in a short period of time, Tony begins to think that he’d be better off braving the shrunken world than the dangers of his loving mother.
1122111.title: Not Noticing the “Little” Things

12.content:
The boy is born naturally small in a world inhabited by normal-sized (but giant to him) women.

Which of these scenarios will apply to the tiny-born boy?

Tiny in a Normal-Sized Family: The boy is born unnaturally small and is raised among the normal-sized females in his family. He could be living in a nice suburban neighborhood, waited on hand and foot in a wealthy mansion, lounging about in a small apartment complex, or sharing another living space in a converted two-story house.

The One-Inch Orphan: The boy is orphaned at a very young age. In one scenario, because he was born so small, the boy is abandoned at the side of a road in a certain location. In another scenario, the boy wasn't abandoned by his parents, but he lost his mother in an automobile accident. He is either sent to the all-girls orphanage in the hoped of being adopted or is assigned to his foster mother or godmother.

The Tiny Race of 'Tweens: The boy(s) come from a race of naturally tiny people. In one route, the boy(s) is a fairy or a pixie living in a forest or around a garden. In another route, the boy(s) is a borrower lives inside the walls of a house/living area of a giant human. In both cases, the young tiny folk explores the residence of a giant female human, but whether or not the women catch them and what they do to the tiny folk is entirely up to you.

-or-

The Ant-Sized Anthro: In a different universe, the boy is an anthropomorphic inhabitant in a world where everyone is not only anthropomorphic, but their size is dependent on their species. The boy could be an anthropomorphic insect, a mouse, any land-based animal small enough to appear nearly unnoticeable by the larger female anthros or delectable by the larger predators.
12.title: Born Tiny

121.content:
The boy is born naturally small, but he lives with a family with no other male relatives, so the boy’s mom(s), sisters, aunts, grandmothers, and/or friends pitch in to take care of him.

Where will the setting of this route take place?

A Nice Suburban Neighborhood: The boy lives in a suburban neighborhood where the neighbors, close or distant, are all females. Aside from his mother and any other female family members, the boy will find there are no other males in the neighborhood, so he makes due with the neighborhood girls who tease him and treats him like a doll, or the other feminine neighbors who want to coddle him or subject him to their whims.

A Wealthy Mansion: The boy is the son of a wealthy woman and lives in a luxurious mansion, where the maids wait on his tiny body hand and foot. The mansion is either aristocratic where the children grow up to be proper lords and ladies, or a mansion where any other kid would grow up similarly to how middle-class children grow up.

-or-

A Co-Ed Apartment Complex: The boy and his female family members live in a co-ed apartment with their roommates, all of them female. The place is either a room in an apartment building or a two-story house built for up to seven people. Despite his initial protests, the tiny boy must share his living space with his giant female roommates and try to avoid becoming their personal toy or slave.
121.title: Tiny in a Normal-Sized Family

122.content:
The boy is born naturally small, but he is also an orphan.

Which of these scenarios will apply to the tiny-born boy?

Abandoned: Because he was born tiny, the baby boy is dropped off the side of the road in a certain location in the middle of the night. The boy could have been dropped off in the backstreets, at a residential neighborhood, or at the doorstop of an orphanage which accommodates only girls (which may or may not coexist with the Orphanage route down below).

Orphanage: The boy is born tiny, but his father died months before the boy's birth date. In the boy's early childhood years, his mother and only living relative perished in a fatal automobile accident, leaving the tiny orphaned boy to be taken by Social Services and assigned to an orphanage that accommodates only girls run by a maternal matron. The boy's life in the orphanage is explored up until he is adopted by a normal-sized woman.

Foster Family: Much like the Orphanage route above, the boy is born tiny and is orphaned at a young age. Not long after the death of his mother, rather than staying at the orphanage, the boy is given custody to a foster family, a distant female relative, or even his godmother. The boy struggles to adjust to his new life living in a family full of giant women without his mother.

-or-

Alone: Much like the Orphanage and the Foster Family route above, the boy is born tiny and is orphaned at a young age, but unlike either route, he has no orphanage or family to take him in. The boy survives his gigantic environment by scavenging discarded objects and/or living within the walls of a human home. Despite his efforts to survive, the boy deeply yearns to have a family. In this route, the boy's wish comes true in the most unexpected and gigantic way!
122.title: The One-Inch Orphan

1221.content:
The boy is born naturally small, but because of this, he was abandoned in the middle of the night.

Which of these areas will the tiny-born boy be abandoned at?

A Residential Neighborhood: The tiny boy is dropped off at a random home in a residential suburban neighborhood. The boy will be found on the doorstep by a normal-sized woman living there, so she takes him in and adopts him. The woman who adopts him is a single mother with two daughters, so he will become the brother the two girls always wanted. The neighborhood is also occupied by an unmarried bachelorette office worker, a married lesbian living with her partner, a middle-aged woman whose children have left for college, or a lonely elderly woman who desperately wished for children, all of them friends with his adopted mother.

The City Backstreets: The tiny boy is dropped off in the backstreets of a city, near the entrance of one of the more dangerous alleyways. The boy will be found in a box with a note telling whoever finds him to give him a good home. The female character who finds him is either a cougar-aged stripper recently off the clock, an immigrant police officer on midnight patrol, a runaway teenager looking for a safe place to sleep, a party girl returning home from celebrating her night out with her friends, or a drug addict looking for their next rush. Despite their questionable positions and the neighborhood they live in, one of these ladies will take the boy in as her own.

An All-Girls Orphanage: The tiny boy is dropped off at the Sunshine Smile Orphanage for Girls, an orphanage which only accommodates girls. Although, in recent years, the orphanage has accommodated another tiny boy who was sent there by Social Services because they felt a mixed orphanage or an all-boys orphanage would be considered dangerous for his tiny size. The tiny boy grows up with the girls, their plump caretaker, and the other tiny boy with whom he looks up to as an older brother figure. (A/N: This route will coexist with this route: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive...)

She'll keep you safe and drive away your fear. You may be young and you may be small, but Mama's love will never change at all."

Except, she couldn't fall asleep, and for good reason, too. She turned to her nightstand where the box sat, the baby sleeping in his makeshift bed, her mind aflutter with so many questions. She couldn't help but contemplate who would drop that adorable miracle of life in a cold, cruel, and unforgiving place, and she couldn't help but wonder why. Suddenly, everything was made clear for her. It would only make sense Benny's birth parents were the only people close to him who would dare leave him out in the open like that. They must have despised him for being born with his condition, so they dropped him at the back alley in the middle of the night and drove away. Angela was glad to have passed down the street when she did, but the thoughts of what could have happened to Benny infuriated her.
