Though she was born underdeveloped than her fellow peers, she makes up for it with her body's flexibility and hypnotic dance moves. She is also very fond of cute things, including puppies, kittens, and babies.

Main Story:

Angela knew this was a bad idea as she strode to the XXX Bombshells, her enormous boobs jiggling with every step, carrying the box containing Benny's tiny form inside. Earlier that morning, she was at a crossroads, debating whether or not she could bring Benny to the club, seeing as how he was a baby and a minor. Unfortunately, she hadn't trusted anybody in the apartment, not even her cranky Japanese landlady. So she went for broke and carried the tiny baby to the club in the red-light district.

Angela entered through the rear entrance of the strip club, an access to the dressing room. When she entered the dressing room, five of her “girls” -all young women who were younger than 35 that she personally taught and trained in stripping and dancing- were all getting ready for their graveyard shift. Currently among them was Shanice, the African-American woman with a larger asset than Angela's; Sofia, the thick Latina who was currently humming her native country's music; Mary, the lovable ditz who was having trouble with her makeup, not remembering which eyeshadow was a darker color; and Emily, the cute redhead who was practicing her sensually flexible movements.

As Angela walked in, Shanice took notice of her in the mirror as she applied her mascara. "Well, look who's showing up so early in the evening," the black woman "greeted" her mentor. "What's wrong, Mama? You couldn't afford to pay the bills, so you decided to come in an hour before your shift?"

"I can manage my finances, thank you, Shanice," Angela responded with the same snippiness as her second-oldest coworker. "Is Meryl here? I really need to talk to her."

"You just missed her, mamá. She stepped out to get a coffee from the store just a few minutes ago," Sofia answered, totally focused on her false eyelashes in her reflection. "She'll be back soon."

“Dammit. Well, I guess there’s no other way around it," Angela murmured. "Girls, could you come around, please? I need to show you all something.” The other four strippers assembled at Angela's desk, but Sofia went and dragged the oblivious Mary away from her eyeshadow crisis to the desk. Angela set the box and carefully opened the lid to the box, revealing the palm-sized boy sleeping inside.

“Aaaaaawwwwww!” the strippers all exclaimed, their hearts melted by his cuteness.

"Ssshhhhh! Not so loud, girls! He's sleeping!" Angela quietly urged the younger women.

“What’s his name?” Sofia asked.

“His name is Benny. That’s what it said on the note, anyway,” Angela answered.

“Note? What are you talking about?” Shanice asked.

Last night, when Iwas walking home after work, I heard him crying in this exact same box you see here," Angela explained. "In it was a note telling someone to give Benny a good home and nothing else. It was cold, dark, and the alleyways were prone for wild animals and muggers, so I had to take him home with me so he could be safe."

“You mean he was abandoned?” Mary gasped.

“Oh, that poor thing,” Sofia cooed sadly, gently rubbing Benny's head with her sand-colored finger, careful not to wake him up. “Don’t you worry, chico, because your new Mama is going to take care of you, like she took good care of us."

"But that's the problem, Sofia, I'm not sure how to take care of him," Angela clarified. "I only came in to talk to Meryl because she's had experience raising her daughter and helping raise her grandson and I need her help to do it." The maternal stripper gently rubbed her thumb on Benny's head, feeling the warmth coming from the soft texture of his skin. "Plus, this isn't a safe environment to raise a child in, and I can't trust anyone in my apartment with taking care of him because he'd either be kidnapped or legally taken away, so..."

"So you need Meryl to give you tips and pointers on how to raise him," Shanice curtly finished.

"That's right," Angela said with a nod.

"You never thought of calling us or asking us for help?"

"I did, but everyone else has too much on their plates to make time to babysit a tiny baby, and..."

"Why don't we just pitch in and see if we can take turns looking after Benny?" Mary asked, and everyone turned to her incredulously. "What? Benny needs someone to watch after him, and she shouldn't have to be the one to do it all alone."

"Yeah! I mean, I already have a babysitting gig that pays me hourly," Emily explained, "but for Angela, I'd be willing to watch him for free."

"Like it or not, even though we strip ourselves and dance naked in front of a drunken crowd, we're not gonna let some kid grow up without a mom in his life," Shanice explained, crouching over Angela's shoulder and watching the tiny bundle of joy sleep in the little box. "Trust me, I grew up without my mama and I haven't exactly turned out for the better. Trust me, that boy needs his mama, and that mama has to be you, Angie."

"That's kind of you to share, Shanice," Angela said, "but I'd rather have to hear what the boss has to say about this first."

Just then, the door opened, and in walked in the manager and the owner of the XXX Bombshells strip club, over twenty years Angela's senior. Her white hair was pixie cut and parted over to her left side, her wrinkles hardly noticeable from a distance. “Places, girls, this is gonna be a busy night,” Meryl, the bombshell GILF said as she walked in with a hot cup of coffee in her hand right before she noticed the newer arrival. “Oh, Angela, you’re here early. Is there something I can help you with?”

"Meryl, we need to talk," the older brunette stripper started, skipping the pleasantries. "I was on my way home last night, and on the street, I saw..."

Meryl's gaze was diverted to the smaller box sitting on Angela's desk. "What is this?" she asked. She approached the box, caught a first glimpse of the tiny boy in the box, and covered her mouth with a large gasp. “What is that..?”

"This is exactly what I needed to talk to you about," Angela said urgently as she rushed to her boss's side. "Please, you have to listen to me!"

What happens next?

1.) Meryl listens to Angela as she explains the situation, and she helps decide what Angela should do
2.) Meryl is disgusted by Angela bringing in Benny to even listen, so she kicks them out
3.) Meryl quickly snatches up Benny and inspects him, prompting her to take action into her own hands
4.) An impatient crowd outside forces Meryl to have Angela to wait to discuss the situation
122121141.title: Bring Your Adopted Tiny-Born Son to Work

choices: Angela is the New Unemployed Mommy
1221211411.content:
Meryl couldn’t believe herself when her oldest employee brought in a baby into her erotic venue, and a tiny one at that! The smokin' senior citizen would have fired Angela on the spot for breaking their most important 21+ age limit, but the desperation and worry in Angela's eyes made her stop. Heaving out a stressed sigh, Meryl regained her composure and turned to her veteran employee with a passive stare.

“Okay, Angela, I’m listening,” Meryl said, crossing her arms.

Angela huffed contently and flipped a strand of her hair backwards. "As I was saying, Meryl, I was just walking home last night when I heard a baby crying in the streets. It came from the box you see right there, right at the edge of an alley, and inside that box was that tiny baby you saw," she explained. "I took him home and I kept him safe and warm through the night, and this morning, I've been busy trying to take care of the baby, but I didn't know what to do! I couldn't leave him alone at my place, and I remember you telling me how you raised your daughter and helped raise your grandson, and I needed to tell you this in person, so..."

"So you gambled telling me in person by coming to work with a baby in a stripper club," Meryl deduced. "I understand why you didn't call me ahead of time, Angela, but if you needed to talk to me, you could've invited me to your place instead of going through all this trouble. You did the right thing coming to me for help, Angela, but this is no place for a baby to be, you know that.”

Angela sighed. "I know."

“Can I see him please?”

Angela nodded her head, and Meryl approached the box at her table. She gently reached inside, scooped her palm inside the box and gently raised her cupped palm to her face, supporting the hand carrying tiny Benny with her other hand. “Hey, little guy. You’ve had an eventful past couple of days, haven’t you?”

Meryl brought the tiny baby to her wrinkled pursed lips and gave the toddler a gentle kiss. Benny seemed to giggle at the sensation, and it warmed the older woman's heart. “Don’t worry, little Benny, we’ll make sure you’ll grow up in a nice home.”

Meryl gently returned Benny to his makeshift bed, tucking him in for warmth. The baby yawned, coming out a squeak, and the memories of being the mother to her newborn daughter and the grandmother to a grandson made her smile warmly. With a sniffle, Meryl turned and placed a hand on Angela's shoulder. "I appreciate you for coming to me for this, Angela, and I know that taking care of the baby has been tough on you..."

1.) "...which is why we'll help you raise him." (Meryl allows Angela to become the adoptive mother of Benny, and the other strippers will volunteer to help.)
2.) "...which is why we'll have to find someone else to take care of him." (Meryl doesn't allow Angela to be the adoptive mother of Benny, and they both put him up for adoption.)
3.) "...and that's why I have to let you go." (Meryl terminates Angela's employment for fear of Benny's exposure to the strip club, but she helps fix Angela up with a new job and a nanny.)

Valerie is as loving as a mother and as firm as a father who dutifully has the girls learn to routinely do their chores and doles out fair punishment for any misdemeanor. She takes especially good care not to let any of the girls take Oliver during Adoption Day, despite how close he is to the girls.

Oliver Martin was the only boy to stay at the Sunshine Smile Orphanage for Girls, an all-girls orphanage, mostly due to his three-inch height. Social Services thought this would be a better recourse on account of how wild the boys orphanages were and feared for his safety. For the first couple of months he was sent there, Oliver felt out of place, despite how friendly he was with the girls residing at the orphanage. Often times, he'd become so friendly, the girls would try to sneak him out, but Valerie, the head caretaker would catch them before they'd take him.

Every quarter year, the orphanage hosts an Adoption Day, where the girls are adopted by a single parent or a couple, and then they would be taken away to a new, better life. Poor little Oliver was left alone, having nobody considering adopting him. All he wanted was a family, someone to love him like how Olivia, his late mother did before the car accident claimed her life. Every day, he prayed for a new mother, a big sister, heck, even a grandmother who would love him, comfort him, raise him into a better child.

Whenever Oliver felt down, the head caretaker, Valerie, always comforted him and did her best to soothe his troubled soul. She'd gently clutch his tiny body to gently embrace him in her pudgy fingers, massage his back with her thumb. She would then indulge him by allowing him to sleep on her fat belly or in between her massive breasts. Despite everything she did to comfort him, she could never replace the hole his mother left behind in his heart. Even so, she was happy to see Oliver getting along with the girls, except for when they'd take things too far by displaying their power over his tiny size. She would protect him like any mother would, and that was a fact the girls had to learn on the first day.

12222.content:
It has been a year and a half since Oliver was first admitted to the Sunshine Smile Orphanage for Girls. A year and three quarters since his mother died and was taken in by the friendly caretaker of the orphanage. Not that there was anything wrong with the orphanage. The tiny-born boy liked it there. Miss McCormick has been very kind to him, and so have the girls living there, but he didn’t want to stay there forever. He missed his mom terribly, and he wanted to have a new family with a mom who loved him unconditionally like his mom did.

At this time, it was the third Adoption Day since Oliver had been brought to the orphanage, and every time, it was the same thing: He’d watch helplessly as all the fortunate girls get accepted by a new family and leave the orphanage for good. Then he’d wait until the next Adoption Day at the orphanage six months later.

Poor Oliver watched the girls he befriended and grew up with leave him behind, all alone and brooding. He wanted to go with the girls so badly, but Valerie had the eyes of a hawk when it came to him. She’d know when a girl was trying to smuggle him out and intervened before they succeeded. Still, at least they kissed him goodbye, but it didn’t make the pain of loneliness go away.

Three Adoption Days, and Oliver still hadn’t had a family come to him. Nearly all of the girls he knew were gone and he couldn’t see them again. He began to realize the futility of finding a family. The loneliness began to eat away at him, so he kept himself alone and away from everyone else. He mostly kept to his room, curled up in his bed in his dollhouse, and that’s where he stayed for the past week.

One day after the first week, Oliver laid in his bed, facing the wall and brooding over the possibility of not being adopted. Valerie watched the tiny boy from the doorframe and a saddened frown spread across her face. She gently hugged little Oliver with her giant pudgy fingers curled around his tiny frame and gently massaged his head with her thumb.

“Oliver? Are you okay, honey?” she asked.

Oliver shook his head. “No. Everyone I love is already going away to a new family and I won’t have a family to live with. A real family.” He felt the urge to sob rising in his chest. “I don’t wanna be alone! I wanna have a new mommy who loves my like my mommy did!”

“Oh, sweetie.” Valerie scooped up the tiny boy in his palm and cradled him against her gigantic breasts. Filtered through her organs, muscles, and skin, her muffled heartbeat brought the tiny boy some comfort as he sniffled and sobbed. “I’m sorry you feel this way, but you don’t have to worry anymore because I have some good news for you: You’re gonna find a new family today.”

Instantly, the boy’s sadness melted and lifted brightly on his young features. “Really!?”

“Yes. They heard about you and your condition, so they already filled out the paperwork and they’re ready to meet you.”

For the first time in a year, Oliver felt genuine hope for his future. Valerie cradled the tiny boy against her breasts as she made her way down to the meeting room where a certain woman waited for them. This particular woman was…

123.content:
The boy is from a naturally small race of tiny humanoid boys.

According to legend, there are many races of tiny people who have hidden themselves away from the human world due to their fear of their malcontent, including fairies and borrowers.

Fairies have been often depicted as small humanoid figures with beautiful dragonfly wings. They are even-tempered, behave like normal human beings, and they dress like them too. They have a love for cheese and fruits, and they are allergic to silver. They bestow happiness, intelligence, and wealth to those they love and love them back.

Sprites, on the other hand, are smaller, more mischievous than fairies who prefer to pull pranks on their giant human hosts. They are often depicted with pointed hats, butterfly wings, and pointed ears and shoes. They have a love for nectar and pollen. Pixies are known to be ferocious fighters, often fighting for the people they love and love them back. Like their fairy counterparts, pixies are allergic to silver.

Borrowers have often been depicted as humanoid figures, and they are sometimes depicted with a rat's tail. They are as small as their fairy and pixie counterparts, often taking shelter in the walls of a human abode, whose scuttling noises make the occupants believe a mouse is crawling the walls. They often take (or "borrow") discarded objects like clothing scraps. Borrowers must remain hidden from the human eyes, and rarely do stories tell of a borrower being spotted by a human.

Which of these races of tiny people will you choose?

Fairies

Sprites

Borrowers

-or-

More than one of the above options

Backstory: Henry Michaels is a wondrous boy who received tickets to Giantess Park, the premiere zoo housing the worlds anthropomorphic giantesses normally seen in a zoo or an aquarium. Henry is also easily excitable, which gets him into occasional trouble, and his life-changing visit to Giantess Park will be no different.

Main Story:

Giantess Park is the world’s largest and only leading menageries to specialize in the conservation and research of giant female anthropomorphic animals. This park is roughly the size of two New York Cities where it houses some of the world’s biggest anthros. Products of an experimental lab accident when an experimental growth serum, mixed with the XX chromosomes, was accidentally released into the Henry Dooley Zoo, Giantess Park was quickly established by the UN to house these feral animalistic giantesses with the express purpose of researching their biology all while becoming the world’s most popular attraction.

Families from all over the world can enjoy riding among the wildest anthros in the Safari Park, or take a big splash with the humanized fish in the Aquarium, get close and personal with the gigantic humanized farm animals in the Petting Zoo, or even take an educational tour through the Extinction Enclosures featuring extinct animals revitalized and humanized through the park’s top leading scientists. For those wanting more exciting and thrills, then families should visit the Amusement Park featuring some of the most heart-pounding thrill rides in the world.

Enter eight year-old Henry Michaels, a young boy with slightly messy black hair with a wondrous personality, who was given season tickets to Giantess Park for the summer for his birthday a week prior. Ever since he watched the commercials for the park, Henry was enraptured by the giantesses and wanted to go so bad, his mom, Jennifer practically caved in and ordered the tickets. Today was the first day he’d visit the park for the summer and he wanted to explore every inch of the park himself. Today, he wanted to explore...

The Safari Park (featuring African wildlife, a savannah, a jungle, and a watering hole)

The Aquarium (featuring exhibits for marine mammals, fish, and other members of the marine ecosystem)

The Petting Zoo (featuring farm animals such as cats, dogs, horses, cows, etc.)

-or-

The Extinction Enclosures (featuring exhibits for revitalized extinct animals, such as dinosaurs, mammals, birds, etc.)
132.title: Welcome to Giantess Park

1321.content:
The Safari Park was the largest section of Giantess Park. Based around the African Savanna, the Safari Park featured wild anthro giantesses based on the African wildlife, ranging from carnivores such as the lions, the cheetahs, and the hyenas, to herbivores such as the elephants, the rhinoceroses, and the giraffe. The elephants were the biggest species in the park, standing as big as sixty feet compared to the other fifty-foot African wildlife.

For safety precautions, the guests rode in a special double-decker vehicle equipped with reinforced paneling designed to withstand a giantess’s crushing weight. Henry and Jennifer entered the vehicle as it plus the other visitors were boarding at the station. The employee with the public-address microphone gave the standard routine introduction, the usual safety procedures (“Please keep your arms and legs inside the vehicle” and all that), and then with the hiss of the brakes’ release, the vehicle was off on its intended route.

Since the Safari Park was the biggest section of Giantess Park, it had to be divided into various subsections: The Savannah, where most of the giant anthros roamed; the Jungle, where the giant anthros lurked in the trees and the bushes; and the Watering Hole, where the anthro giantesses peacefully drank from a giant freshwater lake. In that order, that’s the route the vehicle took, and it took the vehicle a half-hour to complete its route.

Which of these subsections does this particular story route take place?

The Savannah
Carnivores: Lions, Cheetahs, Hyenas
Herbivores: Giraffes, Gazelles, Impalas, Elephants, Rhinoceroses, Zebras

The Jungle:
Carnivores: Leopards, Pangolins, Mambas
Herbivores: Elephants, Antelope, Okapis

The Watering Hole:
Carnivores: Lions, Cheetahs, Leopards, Hyenas, Crocodiles
Herbivores: Hippos, Elephants, Antelope, Gazelles, Impalas
1321.title: The Safari Park

135.content:
Which of these scenarios will apply to the normal-sized boy?

Stranded on an Amazonian Island: The boy (and possibly other boys) survives a shipwreck at sea and wash up on the shores of a remote island not found anywhere on any map! As the boy explores the island, he discovers that the only people who inhabit it are a tribe of Amazonian women, with the adult women standing 10 feet tall, and the girls his age standing as tall as an average-sized adult! The boy is taken in by this tribe, and how they'll react to the boy's presence is entirely up to you.

Ruler of the Giantesses: One day, the boy encounters a giantess who informs him that he is the newest young king to a race of giantesses hidden from the human race, and discovers that he has the power to control the giantesses. With his newfound royal title and power, the boy is given a new family among the giantess race and uses his power to make the giantesses do what he wishes.

Close Friends with a Giantess: When he was younger, the boy befriended a giantess and became close childhood friends with her. The boy's close friendship with the giantess is explored, from the moment when they first encountered each other, to the earlier years of their friendship and their many misadventures, to the boy developing feelings for his gigantic companion. (A/N: The main characters in this route is age-variable, so you can decide their ages, so long as they stay within the age range.)

-or-

Kidnapped!: One day, the boy is kidnapped by a huge giantess and is taken to someplace far away from human civilization (a different dimension, a different planet, a hidden lair, etc.). The giantess has plans for the boy involving some form of torture, but what that torture is, the boy doesn't want to find out. (A/N: This route focuses mainly on an evil giantess torturing the boy, but be sure to follow the rules.)
135.title: Continuing with Normal-Sized I

choices: A Different Part of the World
A Different Era in the Past
14.content:
A normal-sized boy accidentally creates a portal into space-time where everything is big and the women are bigger.

Where does the portal lead him to?

A Different Part of the World: The portal leads into a different part of the world, but the portal is tiny on the other side, so the boy automatically shrinks. He could have been transported in his own home, in a completely different home, in the home of the previous entries in different story routes, or in the home of an important female figure.

A Different Era in the Past: The portal leads into a different era in the past, but the portal is tiny on the other side, so the boy automatically shrinks. He could have been stuck in an earlier time when his mother, his grandmothers, or his female ancestors lived. He could also have landed in the house of a giant woman during ancient times, such as the ancient civilization of Egypt, the global domination of Rome, the Renaissance Era, or the early history of the United States.

A Science Fiction World: The portal leads into a science fiction-like world where everything is science fiction, including but not limited to space travel, space colonies, and extraterrestrial life. The boy (either shrunken or normal-sized among giantesses) will travel to different planets and civilizations where he has to survive when everything else is bigger than him.

-or-

A Fantasy Realm: The portal leads into a magical realm where everything is reminiscent of J.R.R. Tolkien, C.S. Lewis, or George R.R. Martin novels. The boy is transported to a typical area where most fantasy stories take place, including a prospering kingdom with a castle, an enchanted forest either evil or benign, or an evil fortress with lava and brimstone, all of them populated with female characters, including monsters, demi-humans, anthros, witches and sorceresses, etc. (If the boy is transported into a tribe of giant women, he is still normal-sized).
14.title: Transported to Another World

144.content:
The boy is transported into a fantasy realm.

Which of these scenarios will apply to the boy?

Name: Arno Maskins
Age: 9 years old
Eyes: Brown
Hair: Light brown
Height: 3' 4"
Weight: 90lbs
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Arno was your average kid. He enjoyed games, cartoons and his family. One day, however, he stumbled upon something strange in the park and when he picked it up he was transported to a fantasy world. When he arrived there he noticed everything was much bigger than him and that he also appeared in a monster village where all of them are women. He hopes they'll be friendly towards him.

Name: Ryan Lakin
Age: 12 years old
Eyes: Blue
Hair: White
Height: 4'
Weight: 120 lbs
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: After a family dispute he ran away from home and fell into a hole in a forest. When he stopped falling, he noticed he arrived in a gigantic castle and was in the princess' bedroom (feel free to choose what she is.) He now has to choose if he should let himself be seen or stay hidden.
144.title: A Fantasy Realm

145.content:
What other worlds would the portal lead the boy to?

A Great Big Parallel Universe: The portal leads into a parallel universe where his counterpart isn’t born but everyone and everything else is bigger, including his friends and family. The parallel universe could also be the home to a new world order where the female population establish dominance by either growing bigger or shrinking the males down to size. Or maybe the boy is the only male in that universe where only the females populate the Earth.

A Different Media World: The portal leads into another world inside his favorite forms of media, such as television, movies, video games, comic books, or literature books, but the portal is tiny on the other side, so he automatically shrinks. The boy might also accidentally merge the different forms of media together or inadvertently assemble a harem of giantesses who either befriend him or enslave him.

An Anthropomorphic World: The portal leads into a different world where it is inhabited by anthropomorphic animals, but the portal is tiny on the other side, so he automatically shrinks The anthropomorphic animals live in lifestyles similar to those of humans (reminiscent of Zootopia), but humans do not actually exist. The boy must survive in this world where even a pygmy marmoset (the smallest mammal in the world) stands as tall as a two story building.

-or-

A Spooky, Monstrous World: The portal leads into a world where it is inhabited by monstrous giantesses, such as vampires, mummies, werewolves, gargoyles, or anything else from various monster movies or mythology with similar lifestyles to humans. The boy, shrunken to the size of one inch, is too frightened by the appearance of the monster giantesses to realize who is docile or hostile towards the tiny human kid.
145.title: Continuing with Another World I

15.content:
The boy is a character from different media.

What kind of media does the character appear in?

Television: There are a lot of television shows featuring young male characters from different live-action shows (such as Henry Mills from Once Upon a Time, Sheldon Cooper from Young Sheldon), animated series (such as Lincoln Loud from The Loud House, Steven Universe from Steven Universe, and Ben Tennyson from Ben 10), and anime (such as Yugi Muto from Yu-Gi-Oh!, Naruto from Naruto, and Ash from Pokémon).

Movies: There are a lot of movies featuring young male characters from different live-action films (such as Nick Szalinski from the Honey, I Shrunk the Kids film series, Harry Potter from the Harry Potter film series, and Anakin Skywalker from Star Wars: The Phantom Menace), animated films (such as Lucas Nickle from Ant Bully, Fievel Mouskewitz from the American Tail film series, and Miguel from Coco), and anime (such as Sosuke from Ponyo, Sho from Arrietty, and Aoyama from Penguin Highway).

Video Games: There are a lot of video games featuring young male characters such as Young Link (from The Legend of Zelda series), Sora (from the Kingdom Hearts series), and the male Pokémon Trainer (from the Pokémon game series).

Books: There are lots of books featuring young male characters from literature books (such as Jack from Jack and the Beanstalk, Tom Thumb from Tom Thumb, and Spiller from The Borrowers), and comic books (such as Damian Wayne/Robin IV from DC Comics, Peter Parker/Spider-Man from Marvel Comics, etc.).
15.title: A Character from Different Media

151.content:
The boy is a character from different television shows.

Which category of shows does the character appear in?

Live-Action Shows: The boy is a character from live-action shows, such as Henry Mills (from Once Upon a Time), Rico Suave (from Hannah Montana), and King Joffrey (from Game of Thrones).

Animated Shows: The boy is a character from animate shows, such as Lincoln Loud (from The Loud House), Steven Universe (from Steven Universe), and Aang (from Avatar: The Last Airbender).

Anime Shows: The boy is a character from anime shows, such as Ash (from Pokémon), Yugi Muto (from Yu-Gi-Oh!), and Naruto (from Naruto).
151.title: Television

1511.content:
The boy is a character from different live-action television shows.

There are many live-action series that features young male characters, but for the sake of the Live-Action Shows route, the first two routes will be divided into the major television studios that produce them, including Disney and Nickelodeon. That being said, the rest of the routes on this list include individual TV series prominently featuring boy characters. The only question is, which route will you choose?

Disney (featuring The Suite Life of Zack & Cody, That's So Raven, and Hannah Montana)

Nickelodeon (featuring Drake & Josh, iCarly, and Victorious).

Once Upon a Time

Game of Thrones

The boy is a character from different animated television shows.

There are many animated series that features young male characters, but for the sake of the Animated Shows route, the routes will be divided into the major animated studios that produce them, including Disney, Nickelodeon, and Cartoon Network. That being said, the following routes will also have to include subsidiaries and related networks, such as Fox (which has been bought and currently owned by Disney). The only question is, which of these animated studios will you choose?

Disney (featuring Disney Channel, Disney XD, Fox)

Nickelodeon (featuring NickToons, Nick Jr.)

-or-

Cartoon Network (featuring Cartoon Cartoons, Kids' WB)
1512.title: Animated Shows

15121.content:
The boy is a character from the Disney animated television shows.

Since its first airing in 1983, Disney Channel featured many animated series from the 1990's and early 2000's, but for the sake of this route, the first two choices will be divided into two different routes: The first route will focus on Disney Channel animated series that aired in the 1990's, the second route will focus on the animated series that aired in the 2000's, and the third will focus on the animated series that aired in the 2010's. Disney Junior and Disney XD series will also be included.

(A/N: Spin-off shows of certain Disney animated feature films such as The Little Mermaid, Lilo & Stitch: The Series, Timon and Pumbaa, and The Lion Guard will not be added, as they will be added into the Animated Movies route. Also, since Fox has been officially purchased by Disney, Fox animated series such as The Simpsons, Family Guy, and American Dad! will not be added to the first three choices, since Fox was their own individual network.)

The only question is, which route will you choose?

1990's Disney Channel series

2000's Disney Channel series

2010's Disney Channel series

-or-

Fox animated series
15121.title: Disney

15122.content:
The boy is a character from the Disney animated television shows.

Since its first airing in 1979, Nickelodeon featured many animated series (or Nicktoons) that were first featured in the 1990's and later in the 2000's and 2010's, but for the sake of the route, the first three choices will be divided three two different routes: The first route will focus on Nicktoons that first aired in the 1990's, the second route will focus on Nicktoons that first aired in the 2000's, and the third route will focus on Nicktoons that first aired in the 2010's. Nick Jr. series will also be added.

(A/N: Spin-off shows of certain Nickelodeon/DreamWorks animated films such as Monsters vs. Aliens, Kung Fu Panda, and Jimmy Neutron will not be added, as they will be added into the Animated Movies route. Also, certain animated films based on Nickelodeon series such as SpongeBob SquarePants and Rugrats will be added.)

The only question is, which route will you choose?

1990's NickToons series

2000's NickToons series

2010's NickToons series

choices: Avatar: The Last Airbender/The Legend of Korra

The boy is a character from the Nickelodeon animated television shows that first premiered in the 2000's and/or the 2010's.

The first two routes of the previous chapter was intended for the Nickelodeon animated series airing separately in the 2000's and the 2010's, but after reviewing the many Nickelodeon animated series (or Nicktoons) that first aired in those two separate eras, it only made sense that the formerly separate routes would be merged together into a singular route.

The only question is, which of these well-known animated televisions shows will you choose?

Avatar: The Last Airbender/The Legend of Korra

The Loud House/The Casagrandes

The Fairly OddParents

-or-

The boy is a character from the Nickelodeon animated television series, The Loud House, or its spin-off, The Casagrandes.

The only question is, which of these series will you choose?

The Loud House

The Casagrandes

-or-

1512222.title: The Loud House/The Casagrandes

15122221.content:
The Loud House focuses on the main protagonist, Lincoln Loud, the middle child and only brother of the predominantly female Loud family who must endure the everyday chaotic situations of his family. His family consists of his mother, Rita, his father, Lynn Sr. (who will not be appearing), and his ten sisters appearing from oldest to youngest: Lori, Leni, Luna, Luan, Lynn Jr., Lucy, Lola and Lana, Lisa, and Lily.

The question is, which of these scenarios will you apply to Lincoln (and possibly his friends)?

Shrinkin' Lincoln (and/or Friends): Lincoln (and/or his friends) is shrunken by accident by either Lisa’s discarded chemicals or a shrink ray he drops on accident, or is shrunken by a dark magic ritual performed by Lucy. Either way, Lincoln (and/or his friends) is shrunken down to the size of Lily's pinkie finger, small enough to get stepped on or eaten alive.

Born Tiny: Lincoln is one of the billions of children born tiny due to the genetic deficiency of the XY chromosome, so in a family of ten sisters, he is either doted on by the giant girls in his life, or he is seduced by them. He is aware of the dangers posed to his size, so basically, it’s like any other day in the Loud House, but much, much bigger.

Great Big Parallel Universe: Lincoln stumbles into Lisa’s portal which sends him to an alternate universe where he is tiny, but his parallel universe mother, sisters, female friends, or female friends of friends are all giants. In this universe, the boys are completely under the whim of the giantesses in the world, and Lincoln discovers that he is no different from the boys his size!

-or-

Attack of the Fifty-Foot Sisters: Lisa’s experiment with size-alteration accidentally goes haywire while Lincoln is out. Instead of Lincoln shrinking, however, the Loud sisters grow by fifty feet tall, along with some other girls that might have been in range of the experiment's reach. The Loud sisters wreck havoc on Royal Woods and the world, and their focus is mostly shifted on Lincoln and any boy under the age of fifteen.
15122221.title: The Loud House

151222211.content:
Lincoln Loud (and possibly his male friends) is shrunken down to the size of Lily's pinkie finger.

The only question is, how does Lincoln (and/or his friends) shrink?

Shrinking Spring Cleaning: During the annual Loud House spring cleaning weekend, Lincoln is chosen to clean out the attic by collecting boxes full of unused junk. When Lincoln tries to move a box full of Lisa's discarded experiments, he accidentally tumbles everything down, resulting in him being accidentally doused with a mixture of chemicals that shrink him to the size of a bug, but he is rendered invulnerable to physical damage. Things get worse when his mom or one of the older Loud family sisters come up and investigate the noise.

Lucy's Dark Magic: Lincoln and his best friend, Clyde McBride, are hanging out together when they are approached by Lucy, who is desperate for help to finish the rhyme scheme of her latest poem. Sickened by her brother's insistence on hanging out with Clyde and even overhearing how creepy she is, Lucy lures them into her room where she performs a magic spell that shrinks both boys to tiny size. Now Lucy wants Lincoln to hang out with her more often, but he and Clyde plan on running from her.

-or-

A Small Sleepover: Lincoln invites his friends, Clyde McBride, Zach Gurdle, Liam, and Rusty Spokes to a slumber party after school. When the boys accidentally break the TV remote, Liam rushes to find some new batteries and returns with Lisa's shrink ray, to which he accidentally shrinks the boys before Lincoln could stop him. While the shrunken boys panic over their diminutive size, they have to survive Lincoln's ten sisters and/or their female friends they invited for their sleepover party too.
151222211.title: Shrinkin' Lincoln (and/or Friends)

1512222111.content:
It was another weekend in the Loud House, only on this particular spring day, it was a very busy weekend. The entire Loud family was doing their annual spring cleaning where the family members were given a raffle to see which of the chores each Loud family member given.

While the Loud sisters and the parents all did their part with the downstairs, a certain white-haired boy was too busy hauling boxes filled with bulky materials to the open attic door. He grunted as he carried the two-ton box over to the door and dropped it.

“Whew, that’s another box down, only twenty-seven more to go,” Lincoln sighed, wiping the sweat from his head before turning to face the audience. “Spring cleaning is as hard as hard work gets when you live in a big family like I do. And when you live in a big family, getting randomly selected for a spring cleaning chore is like getting a box of chocolates: You’ll never know if you’re gonna get one that’ll leave a bad taste in your mouth.”

Lincoln cringed and felt nauseous. “Bleeuugh, coconut,” he said with a shudder. “Every year, my family drops a name in a hat and we get picked for the chore we have to do. Case in point, I was given the arduous chore to bring down all of the boxes in the attic so we can clean them, polish them, and sell them for our upcoming garage sale... which believe me, it’s not easy as it looks given how my sisters love to cling to the past and not let it go.”

Lincoln went over and picked up another box, this one heavier than the others. “Now if I could just get this downstairs... WHOA!”

By lifting the box, the shifted weight inside caused Lincoln to fall backwards and crash into small tower of stacked boxes, all of the boxes and everything inside to come crashing down all at once. One particular box, labeled “LISA’S EXPERIMENTS” spilled its contents over, knocking out some of Lisa’s old defunct experiments. A few of the contents were glass beakers containing an odd-colored liquid which splashed all over Lincoln just as he was caught in an avalanche of junk.

Lincoln cringed and cowered in a fetal position as everything crashed around him. When he opened one eye, he saw he was still alive but laying in a green puddle. “Huh? What happened to me? Am I still alive?” Lincoln patted his body, then his face, then shone a big smile of relief. “I’m alive! That’s a relief. For a second there, I thought Lynn’s giant bowling ball was gonna crush me!”

Then Lincoln froze on the spot; something was terribly wrong. “Wait... a giant bowling ball?”

He turned his nose up to see a familiar bowling ball looming over him. The severe cracks around the finger holes where Lynn threw a particularly hard throw during a bowling tournament where she earned first prize because the judges wanted her out before she could cause anymore damage.

“But wait... that’s impossible... that’s Lynn’s bowling ball and I don’t remember it being so huge! It couldn’t have grown in size unless...” At a horrible realization, Lincoln looked around and saw everything was huge. The ceiling looked as high as the sky, the floor looked like it was in an extreme close-up view with high definition, and everything else stood over him as tall as the house itself, even taller.

“I’ve shrunk!? How is this possible!?” Lincoln inspected the large puddle he was laying in, then to the cracks of the shattered beaker dripping with the liquid, and the answer came to him in an instant. “Of course, Lisa’s chemicals! She put the chemicals in the attic because they were inconclusive on their own, but combined, they must've created a shrinking chemical that shrunk me, and now I can’t get back to normal size! And then that means...”

Lincoln hurriedly three off his clothing until he was in his underwear and inspected his body. “Oh no! I got doused with Lisa's discarded chemicals! How do I look!? Is my skin different!? Do I have some wings or a tentacle sprouting out of my arm!?”

Lincoln quickly checked his reflection in a nearby shard of broken glass, and sighed contently. "That's a relief, I thought I was turning into a monster. Still, there's the same problem, though. How am I supposed to return to my normal size?"

“Lincoln, what was that noise!?” The tiny white-haired boy stopped as soon as he heard a familiar female voice coming up from the base of the attic steps. “You’d better not be screwing around up there ‘cause you’re gonna be in big trouble if you don’t get your chores done!”

He heard the attic steps creak and felt the footfalls as the giantess climbed up into the attic.

Who was it that climbed into the attic?

1.) His mother, Rita Loud, who heard the commotion as she was passing under the attic door. She came up to investigate the noise and saw the mess, but Lincoln was nowhere in sight, so she swept up the broken glass and threw it in the recycling outside, unaware that she also tossed Lincoln into the recycling as well. Lincoln has to survive the gigantic outside world, as well as the other Loud sisters working outside for their chores.

2.) His eldest sister, Lori Loud, who heard the commotion as she was vacuuming the top floor of the house. She came up to investigate the noise and saw the mess, but Lincoln was nowhere in sight, so she threatened to toss out an old stack of Lincoln's Ace Savvy comic books. Desperate to save his collection of vintage comics, Lincoln tries to get Lori's attention, which may or may not end well for him.
1512222111.title: Shrinking Spring Cleaning

151222212.content:
It was just another day in Royal Woods, Michigan, as the sun rose over the quaint suburban neighborhood, waking up its inhabitants for the day. The sunlight shone through the windows of a certain old house slowly coming apart at the woodwork, shining through a circular window leading into a certain white-haired boy's bedroom. The light made the boy's eyes flutter open, and he sat up in his bed, yawning and stretching. He then licked his lips, scratched his back covered by his pajamas and turned to the audience reading this chapter.

“Oh, hey, you guys! Good morning!" Lincoln Loud greeted the audience through his usual fourth wall-breaking ability. "Sorry, I didn't know you were coming over this early. If I had known ahead of time, I would've put something more decent on. Excuse me."

Lincoln Loud hopped out of his bed, dug through his dresser, and pulled out his signature orange button shirt and blue jeans. He quickly threw his orange pajamas off of himself and slipped his daily attire on. He opened the door to an empty bedroom and slide on the railing downstairs, relieved that he was the only one who occupied this space. More specifically, as the camera zoomed out, he lived in a dollhouse sat on a desk in a closet-turned-bedroom which highly resembled his dollhouse bedroom.

"Okay, so I bet you're wondering why I'm so small and living in a dollhouse like I was living in Gulliver's Travels?" Lincoln addressed the audience. "Well, it's a common genetic deficiency found in male infants that makes us born this small while the other females keep their normal size, but to boys born this size, it's like we're living in a different world full of giant girls! And when you're living in a family with a mom and ten sisters, being this small can be chaotic. Take my sisters, for instance. There are times when they just love to dote on me to butter me up..."

-FLASHBACK-


Lincoln’s second eldest sister, Leni, a regular ditz but a kind-hearted fashionista, finished putting the final stitches in her latest fashion line. It was a snazzy leather jacket with sparkling glitter, just about her little brother's size. She then showed it to Lincoln, who was genuinely surprised by the design. “Here, Linky! I saw this style trending in Young Fashion magazine! It may be a bit snazzy and sparkly, but I guarantee that when the girls at school get a good look at you, they’d just want to eat you up!”

Lincoln graciously took the shirt and instantly popped it on. “Wow, Leni, this is so cool! Thanks!” he said excitedly, admiring his look while the giant ditz of a sister handed him an equally tiny pair of sunglasses. He posed like a cool kid, but the fun stopped when he realized what Leni just said. "Wait, wait, wait, what? The girls at school wanna eat me up? But I'm already having enough trouble trying to avoid the girls in this house who're trying to eat me!"

"Oh, come on, Lincoln, you've got to see the positive side to this suit," Leni waved off her brother's worry. "Think about it, you'd look so cool, the girls will be too distracted fighting over you to even want to eat you!"

Just then, Lori, the eldest and bossy sister of the family, walked into the bedroom, her eyes locked to her cellphone as per usual. “Hey, Leni. Mom says not to cut anymore fabric from the..." Suddenly, Lori gasped and froze in place as she caught a vision of Lincoln wearing his latest jacket. "Wow, Lincoln, you look so cool that I literally just wanna eat you up right here and now!"

"What!? No way, I wanna eat Lincoln first!" Leni protested, getting into Lori's face.

"Back off, ditzy! I'm the oldest, and you already ate him the last time!" Lori rebuked.

"Because I'm the sister who loves him the most!"

"Because you're dumb enough not to see or hear him in your mashed potatoes!"

The two oldest sisters began to butt heads, and a very worried Lincoln began to back away. "I guess Leni's right about one thing, this suit does keep the girls from eating me, but it's stirring up another sister fight!"

Lincoln quickly jumped off the bed and into his toy car, which he turned on and quickly drove away from his two giant sisters, who just noticed him driving out of their bedroom door.

"Lincoln, come back!" Lori squealed as she gave chase.

"I just wanted to give you something nice!" Leni shouted, following the chase.

-FLASHBACK-


One of Lincoln's older sisters, Lola, entered Lincoln's newly redecorated bedroom and placed a two-story dollhouse on the nightstand table. Lincoln watched as the drama queen unfolded the front of the dollhouse, revealing a girly pink exterior. "You like it, Lincoln? This was the dollhouse mom and dad got me a couple years ago at Christmas, but since I hardly play with my dolls anymore, I thought this would be your perfect little home away from home. You can decorate it however yoiu like."

Lola scooped up her tiny big brother and placed him inside, the boy looking around the interior with admiration. “Wow, Lola, this is perfect! I get to decorate my crib, play my video games, read my comic books on the roof in my undies! I don’t think I can ever pay you back for this!”

“Oh, don’t mention it!” Lola dismissed modestly. “It’s the least I can do for retrieving my earring opal from a certain someone’s belly who had no business eating disgusting frog eggs in the first place!” she growled loudly out the door.

“Hey, it’s not my fault you kept losing your dumb earrings!” argued Lana, the other twin who was more of the dirty tomboy of the twins, popping her head from behind the door frame. “Which reminds me. Hey, Lincoln! If you ever want to do a Fantastic Voyage video of our digestive system, I’m always free!”

“Thanks, Lana, but... I’ll pass for now,” Lincoln gently refused, nauseated by the last time he went into Lana’s stomach to retrieve Lola's opal earring she accidentally swallowed and found some of the most disgusting half-digested mush and goop in her acids.

“Aww, okay, but my offer still stands!” Lana called, ducking behind the door frame. “Oh, look, termites!”

“What!? Termites!?” Lola screamed, zipping out of Lincoln’s room in an instant. “Lana, don’t you dare keep those termites in this house! We are not going to endure another weekend with Aunt Ruth and that's final!"

At his sisters' behavior, Lincoln slapped his forehead and groaned.

-FLASHBACK-


“Here you go, bro. My first music player from when I first started rockin' out,” Luna, the third oldest sister and rocker said as she gently set her old miniature music player in Lincoln's dollhouse bedroom, which, at his size, was as big as a normal-sized flat-screen TV. She also plugged in a couple of earphones and twirled them around the player. “And as an added bonus, these old earphones will act like your own personal stereo, so you should be really rocking’ to hours of entertainment in your new bedroom!”

“Really!? Cool!” Lincoln pressed the play button, and SMOOCH blared through the headphones like a mega stereo. The force was so loud and so great, Lincoln was knocked backwards and landed in Luna’s shirt and in between Luna's breasts. The rocker sister was initially surprised, but as Lincoln struggled to climb out, it tickled her where she was laughing nearly uncontrollably. The tiny white-haired boy scrambled up to the collar, popped his head out of the torn collar, and gasped for air.

"Wow, bro, I didn't realize that you really had it in ya." Lincoln looked up to Luna's towering amorous face, and his was flushed a beet red. "If you really want a good time, I can call up Sam and her brother over, and we can have a real playdate."

"Wait, Luna, it's not like that!" Lincoln stammered. "It was an accident! I didn't mean to...!"

Lincoln was interrupted by a pair of giant fingers pinching him from the back of his shirt and lifting him up to Luna's smiling face. "Aww, come on, bro, I'm just joshing with you, you know that," the Loud family's rock star said, clenching her tiny brother in both hands and snuggling him against her freckled cheek. "But, if you ever want to join in the fun with Sam and I, I'll be here when you're ready to roll with the changes."

Luna kept her hands clenched as she brought him to her pursed lips, enveloping his face in a kiss and covering him in saliva.

"LUNAAAA!"

-END FLASHBACK-


"Oh yeah, and if you live in a big family like I do with nothing but a mom and ten sisters, then you'll be the object of everyone's desire," Lincoln informed the audience, "but that's just another average day in the Loud house. Every day for kids born with the same shrinking condition like me is an adventure or a struggle to survive an entire world that's big enough to eat you or squash you flat. Luckily for me, I can't be killed by those means, but that doesn't make them any less painful."

At that point, as the narration ended...

1.) Lincoln drives his car to the bathroom through a chaotic, sister-infested hallway.
2.) Rita Loud enters; it's time for breakfast, and she's carrying him and Lily downstairs.
3.) One of Lincoln's sisters enters; it's time for their scheduled hangouts.
151222212.title: Little Born Lincoln

1512322.content:
Steven Universe focuses on the titular main protagonist, Steven Universe, the half-Gem, half-human hybrid boy who lives with the Crystal Gems, a small faction of female polymorphic sentient gemstones who resists the oppressiveness of the Gems' Homeworld. The cast consists of predominantly female characters (such as Garnet, Amethyst, Pearl, Connie Maheswaran, etc.) and naturally and unnaturally giant women (such as the Diamonds, and the giant Gem Fusions).

(A/N: The routes can include AU routes where the Gems are humanized.)

The only question is, which of these scenarios will you apply to the young Steven Universe male cast?

Size-Alteration: There are many ways that the Crystal Gems can shrink or grow, such as shapeshifting or Homeworld's size-alteration technology, but what happens when they apply to a human boy? In one scenario, Steven tries to shapeshift with his Gem, but he ends up permanently shrinking with every failed try. In another scenario, a young male character around the required age limit or lower gets ahold of Homeworld's technology, leaving them shrunken and at the mercy of the giant women from Earth or Homeworld. In another scenario, Yellow Diamond demonstrates her size-alteration ability and uses it against the young humans of the Earth or the Zoo.

Born Tiny: The male cast is only a tiny fraction of the billions of children born tiny due to the genetic deficiency of the XY chromosome, so with a cast of predominantly female characters, they are doted on by the giant girls in their lives, or they are seduced by them. The characters are aware of the dangers posed to their sizes, so basically, it’s like any other episode of The Loud House, but with a cast of bigger female characters.

Normal-Size Among Giantesses: The male characters are born normal-sized, but the female characters in the series are more massive than him. In one scenario, the Gems are all gigantic thanks to Yellow Diamond's size-alteration abilities to use for conquest, but the Crystal Gems are big enough to stop the conquest. In another scenario, the Gem Fusions are natural Gem giants who don’t need to be formed by fusing their base Gems (i.e. Sugilite, Sardonyx, Opal, Obsidian, etc.). In another scenario, a young male character is raised by the Diamonds, and they all indulge on his tiny size.

-or-

Borrowers: The male characters are borrowers, a race of tiny people who hide within the walls of the bigfolk and "borrow" discarded or lost items. The borrower makes refuge in the home or a different location where a female character(s) from the series is prominently seen. (A/N: In this route, if Steven is born a borrower, then the Gems become humanized characters since Steven being born a half-Gem hybrid would tie in to the Born Tiny route.)
1512322.title: Steven Universe

15123221.content:
The characters from Steven Universe have their sizes altered.

The only question is, which of these scenarios will you apply to the young male characters in the series?

Shapeshifting Gone Wrong: Steven tries to practice his shapeshifting abilities using his Gem, but he accidentally shrinks each time that he fails. The worst part is that the changes are permanent, and because Steven is a half-Gem, he doesn't have the power to restore himself back to normal size! Fortunately, he can still retain his ability to conjure up shields and his protective bubble.

Homeworld's Size-Alteration Technology: In Steven Universe, some of the spaceships from Homeworld feature sa spatial warping mechanism that alters the occupants' size. In this scenario, a young male character discovers one such spaceship and meddles around with it, accidentally activating the size-alteration mechanism that shrinks them down or makes a nearby female character grow into giant size!

-or-

Yellow Diamond's Conquest: Yellow Diamond is a giant, tyrannical commander with the ability to alter the sizes of Gems, including herself! To demonstrate this power, she either uses this power to grow herself or grow one of her loyal Gem underlings to giant size and rampage across the Earth or test it on the young humans in the Human Zoo! Yellow Diamond is also granted Homeworld's mind manipulation technology from White Diamond, so she'll be able to control the giant-sized Gems she so chooses, including the traitorous Crystal Gems.
15123221.title: Size-Alteration

15123222.content:
The boy is a character from Steven Universe who was born small.

The only question is, which one of these boys will you choose?

Steven Universe: Steven Universe is born to Greg Universe (who was also born small as well) and Rose Quartz, who was secretly Pink Diamond, the rebellious warrior defected from The Great Diamond Authority. After Pink Diamond/Rose Quartz gave her physical form to create Steven, the young half-human, half-Gem hybrid was raised by his guardians, the Crystal Gems. He is a breath of fresh air for the citizens of Beach City and often sees the positive side to being tiny, even though being small can be hazardous at times.

Lars Barriga: Lars Barriga is the teenaged employee of the Big Donut shop along with his female co-worker, Sadie. At some point, Steven and Lars are kidnapped and taken to Homeworld where Steven faces trial while Lars is held as evidence of human incompetency. During their escape, Lars is killed by a robinoid, but he is revived by Steven's tears. Lars explores the universe as the tiny, fearless leader of the Off Colors group, a small resistance of "defective" or "off-color" Gem Fusions.

Peedee Fryman: Peedee Fryman is the son of Mr. Fryman, the co-owner of Fried Pizza along with the Pizza family, and the younger brother of Ronaldo Fryman, a mysterious phenomena fanatic who disappeared trailing a story for his blog, "Keep Beach City Weird." Peedee is close friends with Kiki and Jenna Pizza despite their fathers' rivalry, and they often hang out with each other when business isn't too busy. Still, Peedee can't help but wonder what happened to his brother and would sneak out to find any trace of him left.

-or-

Onion: Onion is the son of the fisherman, Yellowtail, the painter, Vidalia, and the younger half-brother of Sour Cream. Onion is a strange, silent, and mischievous boy who weirds out Steven and often gets into dangerous, delinquent behavior. He is also friends a few other boys who indulges in these criminal behaviors, including theft and vandalism, which puts them in big trouble with the giant female cast members. (A/N: Since Onion is still practically a child during Steven Universe Future, he should still appear in this route.)
15123222.title: Born Tiny

15123223.content:
The boy is a character from Steven Universe that's born normal-sized but is among larger female characters.

The only question is, which of these scenarios will you apply to the young male characters in the series?

Giant Gems: Yellow Diamond is a giant, tyrannical commander with the ability to alter the sizes of Gems, including herself! Using this ability, she grows the loyal Gems into giant size to conquer the universe, but their attempts to conquer Earth are met with resistance from the traitorous faction, the protectors of Earth, the Crystal Gems! (A/N: Since Steven is a half-human, half-Gem hybrid, he retains his normal human size.)

Giant Gem Fusions: In Steven Universe, the Gem Fusions are naturally bigger than their base Gems when fused together (i.e. Garnet being the fusion of Ruby and Sapphire, Opal being the fusion of Amethyst and Pearl, etc.), but in this route, the Gem Fusions are naturally giants who do not need their base Gems to fuse. (A/N: Steven and Connie's fusion, Stevonnie doesn't exist, as the Gem hybrid-human fusions do not exist in this route. However, such Gem hybrid-Gem fusions such as Smoky Quartz, Rainbow Quartz, and Obsidian still exist in this route.)

-or-

Son of the Diamonds: The boy is a young male character who was raised by The Great Diamond Authority. In one scenario, Steven Universe is taken by the Diamonds' forces when they discover Pink Diamond was Rose Quartz who gave her existence up to create Steven but was instantly loved by them. In another scenario, the boy(s) is a citizen from Earth abducted by the Diamonds' underlings and became the Diamonds' ward and personal servant. In another scenario, the boy is a Zooman whose parents were shot out to space after their passing, so the lonely boy was taken in by the Diamonds and was showered with their reawakened maternal love.
15123223.title: Normal-Size Among Giantesses

15123224.content:
The boy is a character from Steven Universe who is a borrower, a race of tiny people who hide within the walls of the bigfolk and "borrow" discarded or lost items.

(A/N: Since Steven is born a borrower, the Gems in this story route will become humanized.)

The only question is, which one of these boys will you choose?

Steven Universe: Steven Universe is born to Greg Universe (also a Borrower) and a human mother named Rose, and for that, Greg was banished from his clan. One rainy day, a mudslide separated Steven from Greg while the latter was buried under the mud. Grieving, Steven takes refuge in either a beach house (home to the Crystal Gems Foundation for Castaway Females) or a suburban house (home to Connie Maheswaran and her mother).

Lars Barriga: Lars Barriga is a seasoned borrower in his teens, scrounging off donuts from the Big Donut shop while sneaking around hidden in Sadie's satchel and "borrowing" from her and her mother. At some point, Lars is accidentally snatched up and brought to a mansion, home to three powerful socialites and their miserable daughter, The Great Diamond Authorities, and an army of female-only security guards.

Peedee Fryman: Peedee Fryman is the son of a seasoned borrower and younger brother to the foolish borrower, Ronaldo, all of whom living in Fish Stew Pizza, home to Beach City mayor Nanefua Pizza and her granddaughters, Kiki and Jenny. When Kiki Pizza discovers Peedee by accident, she captures him in a jar and is forced to be left behind by his father and brother. Peedee and the female Pizza family members become good friends and becomes his new family, despite their size difference.

-or-

Onion: Onion is an orphaned borrower who formed a small group of other orphaned borrowers his age to cause mischief, similar to the nature of pixies in mythology. Residing in their main base within the barn inhabited by a few members of the Crystal Gems Foundation for Castaway Females, Lapis Lazuli, Peridot, and Bismuth, Onion and his friends cause mischief by vandalizing and compulsively "borrowing" non-discarded items from different Beach City homes, from the Crystal Gems' beach house to The Great Diamond Authorities mansion.
15123224.title: Borrowers

1513.content:

15211.content:
In the wake of science fiction films in the 1950's, many films were centered around theme of size-changing where the central character or antagonist is either enlarged or shrunken. The most prominent examples include the Incredible Shrinking Man, and Attack of the 50 Foot Woman. The subject of size-changing themes in live-action movies is rarely touched upon, but there are other films that are centered upon this theme, including Honey, I Shrunk the Kids, The Fantastic Voyage, and Village of the Giants.

In this route, we will be focusing on certain boy characters appearing in these shrinking/growing-themed live-action films, either as a canon character such as Genius (from Village of the Giants), or an original character of your choice within the canon or non-canon size-changing films. They will be shrunken, born tiny, or every woman in the following films is bigger than the normal-sized character. The only question is, which of these well-known size-changing films will you choose?

Honey, I Shrunk the Kids series

Attack of the 50 Foot Woman

Village of the Giants

-or-

The Incredible Shrinking Man/Woman
15211.title: Size-Changing Films

choices: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid
152111.content:
Walt Disney Pictures' Honey, I Shrunk the Kids franchise is heavily centered around the theme of shrinking and growing. In Honey, I Shrunk the Kids, the focus kids are shrunken down by Wayne Szalinski's shrinking ray, and they must traverse a dangerous, giant world to return to normal size. In Honey, I Blew Up the Kid, the Szalinski's two year-old son, Adam is grown into giant size by the same shrinking ray and causes damage to Las Vegas. In Honey, We Shrunk Ourselves, the older family members of the Szalinski family is shrunk by the same ray and they must grab their children's attention while they have a house party.

For this route, we'll be exploring each movie in the Honey, I Shrunk the Kids film series individually and making significant alterations to the plot of each movie so the main boy characters are smaller than the giantesses appearing in each film. The only question is, which of the films will you choose?

Honey, I Shrunk the Kids

Honey, I Blew Up the Kid

-or-

Honey, We Shrunk Ourselves
152111.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids series

1521111.content:
In Honey, I Shrunk the Kids, the kids - Nick Szalinski, Amy Szalinski, Russ Thompson Jr., and Ron Thompson - are all shrunken down by Wayne Szalinski's shrinking ray where they are accidentally swept up by the unknowing inventor and thrown out into the outside trash can.

After escaping the trash can, the kids traverse the dangerous jungle of the Szalinski's front yard where they are nearly drowned by the automated sprinklers, befriend a scouting ant while eating a giant, discarded oatmeal cookie, attacked by a scorpion which was fatally stung defending the kids, and nearly killed by a lawnmower pushed by Nick's friend, Tommy. The Szalinski family dog, Quark, happens upon the shrunken kids and take them inside the house.

While Quark carried the kids inside the house, Nick falls into Wayne's bowl of Cheerios and is nearly unknowingly eaten by his father. Quark saves the boy by biting Wayne's ankle, making him aware of Nick's presence in his spoon and on the tabletop counter. Wayne successfully grows the children back to size and the families make up.

In this story route, Wayne Szalinski and Russ Thompson are absent, but the former's shrinking ray is still fully functional. The kids are still going to be shrunken down, but instead of Amy being shrunken, Nick's friend, Tommy is shrunken while Amy, Diane Szalinski, and Mae Thompson each provide the roles as the main giantesses in the story.

The only question is, which part of the movie do we focus on?

The Attic: Russ Jr. and Ron accidentally hit the baseball through the attic window which activates the shrinking ray, while Nick and Tommy are hanging out at the Szalinski house. When the boys are shrunken, one of the female Szalinski members enter the attic to investigate the noise, unaware that her young son and his friends are at her feet.

The Front Yard: While the boys are traversing the jungle of the Szalinski's front yard, one of the main female cast members happen to step out into the yard. It is either Diane, who returned from an errand, Amy, who is searching for Nick and Tommy, and/or Mae Thompson, who is searching for her two sons. They are unaware that the boys are hidden among the blades of grass at their feet, at least until Amy realizes what happens to the boys.

The Breakfast: After being carried by a pollen-collecting bee, the boys are flown inside the Szalinski house where Amy, Diane, and Mae are all having breakfast while they're discussing what happened to their boys. The boys fall after Mae swats the bee away, but they either land on the counter, or in one of the giant girls' breakfasts. Diane is drinking coffee, Mae is eating a bowl of Cheerios, and Amy is eating a Pop-Tart.
1521111.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids

1521112.content:
In Honey, I Blew Up the Kid, three years after the events of the first film, Adam Szalinski, the youngest child of the Szalinski family, is accidentally hit with a variation of his father, Wayne Szalinski's shrink ray, which enlarges the targeted objects during a visit at his workplace, Starling Labs.

During the course of the film, Adam continuously grows from exposure to electromagnetic waves while he is babysat by his brother, Nick, and his babysitter and Nick's crush, Mandy. Wayne's Szalinski's corrupt coworker, Dr. Charles Hendrickson, sought to use the growth ray which turned Adam into a giant and take over Starling Labs to do so. The climax of the film takes place in Las Vegas where the giant-sized Adam, along with Nick and Mandy, are cornered by Hendrickson before the giant-sized Diane intervenes. Wayne shrinks Diane and Adam back to normal size, and also accidentally Nick and Mandy in the process.

In this story route, Wayne is absent, Adam isn't a giant, and Wayne's shrinking/growing ray is still functional. Either Nick and Adam are going to be shrunken accidentally, or one or more of the female characters in the film, such as Diane, Mandy, and/or Amy, will be accidentally hit by the growth ray and they grow into 100 foot giantesses.

The only question is, which part of the movie will you choose?

The Shrinking Ray: While Wayne is away, Nick and Adam explore their father's lab and they get hit by his malfunctioning shrinking ray, causing them to shrink to a familiar tiny size while Diane and Amy are home before they move to college OR Mandy arrives to babysit Adam. Nick has to watch out for Adam's safety while they're tiny since he's a curious and wondrous two-year-old boy.

The Growing Ray: This route closely follows the main story in the film, focused solely on the primary female cast members being giant instead of Adam. While searching through Wayne's lab, Amy, Diane, and/or Mandy are hit by Wayne's malfunctioning growth ray. After getting continuously exposed to electromagnetic waves, the girl(s) grow into over 100 foot giantesses. Nick and Adam are roped into an adventure with their giant female relatives and/or love interest.
1521112.title: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid

1521113.content:
In Honey, We Shrunk Ourselves, eight years after the events of the previous film, the adults - Wayne Szalinski, Gordon Szalinski, and their respective wives, Diane and Patti of the film are shrunken by Wayne's shrinking ray while their kids host a party with their friends, not knowing they were tiny.

During the course of the film, the Szalinski brothers and their wives trek the dangerous territory of their house while the children party in the ground floor. The Szalinski brothers float in a bubble, which pops above a bowl of French onion dip where they were nearly devoured by the girls while avoiding their dipping chips. Their wives befriends a daddy long legs caught in a spider web and they use him to explore the rest of the house and grab the kids' attention.

While the adults explore the house, they notice their kids maturing and get a fresh new perspective on their needs, having disagreements prior to the shrinking event. Eventually, Wayne hot-wires the living room speakers and the adults finally grab the kids' attention. After a lengthy discussion, the kids change their parents back to normal size.

In this route, the Szalinski brothers are absent and their wives don't shrink, but the boys do. Adam and Mitch Szalinski are shrunken around the shrinking events and/or Ricky King and his two friends, Vince and Trey, are shrunken during the party. (A/N: This route will be interconnected at certain points to be canon with the film, but they'll still be separate categories. Also, you also add the female characters from the previous films in this route.)

The only question is, which part of the movie will you choose?

The Pre-Party Size-Alteration: Adam and Mitch explore Wayne's attic laboratory where they accidentally trigger the size-altering machine. Either the machine shrinks them to three quarters of an inch tall, leaving them at the unaware mercy of Jenny or their mothers in the house, or the machine grows the girls into 100 ft. giantesses.

The Little Bullies' Big Mistake: Ricky King and his two friends are bullies who crash Jenny's party. When Ricky is rejected by Jenny after an unwanted kiss, he and his friends go upstairs and trash the attic, accidentally activating the shrinking machine and shrinking them down to Adam and Mitch's current size. A little karma will spell big trouble for their futures.
1521113.title: Honey, We Shrunk Ourselves

152112.content:
The original 1958 version of Attack of the 50 Foot Woman is a independent classic film which spotlights Nancy Archer, a wealthy but emotionally unstable heiress whose close encounter with an extraterrestrial alien life form results in her being exposed to radiation which made her grow to the size of fifty feet. The film is also centered around the themes of marital problems and emotional instability.

The 1993 made-for TV remake of the original film stays close to the original, albeit somewhat altered storyline while retaining the themes of marital issues and emotional instability, as well as the additional themes of power being granted to femininity.

That being said, since the unhappy couple centered in those movies didn’t have any children, nor include any children in both versions of the film. In this story route, we'll be exploring Nancy's adventures as a giantess where she interacts a young boy slightly bigger than her thumb. (A/N: Since both versions of the film feature similar characters, it's only fitting we feature similar original characters, albeit with a similar surname).

The only question is, which version of the film do we follow?

The 1958 original version

-or-

The 1993 remake version
152112.title: Attack of the 50 Foot Woman

1522.content:
The boy is a character from different animated movies.

There are may animated films that features a young male character, but for the sake of the Animated Movies route, the routes will be divided into the major animated studios that produce them, including Disney/Pixar Animation Studios, and DreamWorks Animation. The other routes will feature two individual animated films featuring shrinking and/or tiny male characters.

(A/N: Spin-off shows of certain animated feature films such as The Little Mermaid, Kung Fu Panda, and The Lion King will be added.)

The only question is, which route will you choose?

Disney/Pixar Animation Studios (featuring the Disney Princess movies, The Lion King, and The Incredibles)

DreamWorks Animation (featuring Madagascar, Bee Movie, and Kung Fu Panda)

An American Tail

-or-

The Ant Bully
1522.title: Animated Movies

153.content:
Since the early 1960's release of Spacewars!, the video game industry has grown into the one of the world's central form entertainment behind broadcast and cable TV. In the 1980's, the video game industry boomed with the release of arcade video games such as PAC-MAN, Donkey Kong, Super Mario Bros., and Street Fighter, to name a few.

In the 1990's, the industry expanded further not only with the release of video game consoles (such as the Nintendo hardware systems and the Sony PlayStation consoles), but with the release of video games with early 3-D graphics. Star Fox and Donkey Kong Country were among the earliest examples. The early 2000's saw the rise of revolutionary gameplay, such as double-screen handheld consoles, motion controls, mobile gaming, and a console switching from docking at the television to a handheld console.

During the expansion of the video game industry, many influential video game companies have made their mark in the industry, more prominently Nintendo, SEGA, Capcom, and Square Enix, each of them being well-known for their influential game franchises.

Nintendo has many iconic games featuring young male characters, but for the sake of the Video Games route, Nintendo will feature its own route. That being said, some of the more iconic games from different major game companies like SEGA, Capcom, and Square Enid appears on this route.

Which of these prominent video games will you explore?

Nintendo (featuring Super Mario, The Legend of Zelda, and Pokémon)

Sonic the Hedgehog series

Street Fighter series

-or-

Final Fantasy series
153.title: Video Games

1531.content:
Nintendo has been the hallmark video game company since the early 1980's. Arcade games such as Super Mario Bros., Donkey Kong, and The Legend of Zelda have grown into some of the best-selling video game franchises in the series, each one known for their revolutionary gameplay mechanics, their storytelling, and most importantly, their iconic characters, including Nintendo's mascot and most iconic video game character, Mario.

In this route, we will be focusing on certain boy characters appearing in Nintendo's famous franchises, either as a canon character such as Young Link (from The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time and Majora's Mask), or an original character of your choice within the canon or non-canon Nintendo game universes. They will be shrunken, born tiny, or every woman in the Nintendo games is bigger than the normal-sized character. The only question is, which of these famous Nintendo franchises will you choose?

Super Mario Bros. series

The Legend of Zelda series

Pokémon series

-or-

Super Smash Bros. series
1531.title: Nintendo

15311.content:
Super Mario Bros. is the most iconic video game series in video game history, with the series' star frontrunner, Mario being the most iconic video game character in history.

Since his debut in the original Donkey Kong arcade game in the early 1980's, Mario has grown exponentially from a fictitious plumber climbing up structures to save the damsel from a giant gorilla, to a fan favorite and Nintendo's commercial success, pumping out very well-known games such as Super Mario Bros., Super Mario World, and Super Mario 64 to name a few.

In the 1990's, Super Mario introduced a franchise of long-running spinoff games, from party games such as Super Mario Party, to racing kart games such as Super Mario Kart, to even later games focusing primarily on different main characters such as Luigi's Mansion, Super Princess Peach, and the different Wario games. Not only does the franchise publish well-received games, but it has also release popular characters such as Luigi, Peach, Bowser, Daisy, Bowser Jr. and many more.
