“Very good,” Hippolyta acknowledged as she entered her chambers and settled onto her bed, holding Timmy flat on her palm. "Now hold out your fists to me." Timmy held out his fists, just as the queen ordered him to. "Turn them over."

Timmy overturned his arms, showing the underside of his fists. Hippolyta gently laid her gigantic hand over Timmy's arms, and suddenly, her bracelet glowed as a little drop of light trickled onto his wrists. The light wrapped around the wrists and faded, giving Timmy a pair of metal bracelets just like the giantess said. "Now you are bound to me, young Timmy Walker. As long as you are bound to me, no harm may come of you, nor shall any Amazon attempt to break it. When you are in distress, these bracelets will glow, indicating you are in trouble. In exchange, you will need to do as you are told, but the tasks I will assign you will accommodate your youth and size. Do you understand?"

"Y-Yes, your majesty," Timmy stuttered.

"Very good," Hippolyta nodded. "Now, I fear this is sudden for you, but I propose we begin your basic training now."

The Queen of the Amazons then guided the boy to...

1.)...the floor. Hippolyta wants Timmy to massage her feet.

2.)...the nightstand with the bowl of fruit. Hippolyta wants Timmy to feed her the fruit from the bowl.

3.)... her back. Hippolyta wants Timmy to massage her back.
15512143111.title: Timmy’s Guardian Queen

choices: A Visit from the Amazon General
155121431111.content:
“Now then, Timmy, for your first task,” she said, guiding the little boy in her hands to the floor, “I want you to massage my feet.”

Hippolyta lowered the boy with cupped hands to the floor, tilting them to prompt Timmy to hop off and stand before the foot of the queen. To Timmy, the queen’s imposing size made her look like a goddess, like the one he’s seen statues of on the way. Like them, she stood tall like a monolith, dressed in a long, fuchsia-colored toga. Slipping from that elegant toga was a pair of giant, beautifully-maintained feet clad in leather sandals. She gently lowered them before her new young charge, but to Timmy, he could feel the tremor as she daintily slapped them on the floor.

Timmy felt a certain overwhelming fear as he was presented his first task of massaging the queen’s feet. The toes alone were just as big as him, almost a little bigger, but they were still threatening. He couldn’t erase the traumatic moment when he was kicked around and crushed under Artemis’s feet from his mind. Just being next to a giant foot gave him certain pause.

“I understand your reluctance to carry out the task, little one,” Hippolyta said, “but please know you will be seeing this a lot during your stay here at Themyscira. This is part of your training as my personal servant, so you must learn to face your fears.”

“But... but I’m scared of going inside your sandal,” Timmy said.

“Here. Allow me to make it easier for you.”

Hippolyta lifted one leg up, unstrapped her sandal, and set it back down to the floor bare. She then proceeded to the same thing with the other foot. With both feet bare and touching the cool textile floor, Hippolyta lifted both feet up by the heel, scrunching her toes.

“There. This should make things easier to perform your tasks,” the Queen of the Amazons said, setting her feet fully flat to the floor, “but remember this, little one: someday, you will have to unstrap my sandals yourself, but it will only happen if you are willing to continue your training.”

“I-I’ll try my hardest, your majesty,” Timmy answered nervously.

“That’s what I expect from you, my young charge,” acknowledged Hippolyta, “and speaking of expectations, I am still waiting for that massage I ordered a little while ago.” Hippolyta slid her feet forwards towards Timmy, her toes slightly wriggling with anticipation.

Taking a deep breath, Timmy bent down and started to rub his hands on Hippolyta’s giant toes, starting with the big toe. The giantess’s digits wriggled at the ticklish sensation, making the tiny boy recoil a bit. Nevertheless, he had a moral obligation to fulfill his first duty and he had to do it. Bending gown into a squat, Timmy pressed his hands into the skin of the toe and gently squeezed into the soft, smooth flesh. He worked his squeezing grip around the smooth skin of the foot like he was kneading dough for bread.

Although, for this particular knead, Timmy wasn’t making bread, though Hippolyta’s feet smelled similar to bread. Gently, he maneuvered his massage around the perimeter of the big toe, not missing a single inch of skin to thoroughly massage it before he moved it lower to the underside of the giantess’s digit. Sensing this, Hippolyta lifted up her toes, which allowed Timmy to easily reach the underside of her foot. The skin was softer and malleable than the rest of the foot. Timmy figured that this was where he was given a chance to show his skill as someone who watched his father give his mother a foot massage after a stressful day of work. He pressed his hands hard into the supple skin and squeezed hard.

Up above, Hippolyta three her head back and sighed in blissful content. She didn’t want to admit it, but despite the boy’s tiny size and young age, his massages felt like Elysium. While the sensations tickled a little, she could feel her muscles in her feet relax around the areas she didn’t realize where slightly stiff until Timmy worked his way around them. In her mind, she made the right choice in taking in the tiny boy as her own personal servant, technically confined to her by law, and encouraging him to fulfill his duties to her.

While Hippolyta enjoyed the feeling of her tiny charge work his way in between her toes, then eventually moving on to rubbing slow circles on the ball of her foot...

1.) ...Hippolyta asks about Timmy's life prior to the plane crash.
2.) ...Hippolyta asks about Timmy's experience under Artemis's foot.
3.) ...Phillipus walks through the door.
155121431111.title: Hippolyta’s Tiny Foot Masseuse

1551214311112.content:
“You are doing well for someone your size, little one,” Hippolyta complimented the little boy, “especially when you consider your recent experience trapped under the foot of our fiercest warrior.”

Timmy suddenly froze at the mention of his short but terrifying time being trapped under Artemis’s foot, pinned between the flesh of her sole and the surface of her sandal. “Y-Y-Yes, your majesty, it was really really scary.”

“As scary as the person you accidentally squashed you underfoot?” Hippolyta inquired, a childish smirk spread across her beautiful lips.

“I don’t know, but she seems pretty scary.”

Suddenly, the giant queen of the Amazons threw her head back and let out a boisterous laugh. She already loved this kid and his innocence. “I can only imagine! The feet of my best warrior is more frightening than the warrior herself!” she chuckled, suddenly finding herself clearing her throat and regaining her composure. “In all seriousness, child, I can’t imagine how terrible it must have been when you were trapped in her shoe. Since you have faced your fear of being trampled underneath our giant feet, perhaps you can share what it was like being trapped under Artemis ‘s feet?”

The tiny bite-sized boy swallowed a lump, nervous from even thinking about that traumatic experience. Eventually, he found his voice and the words that came out. “It was tight... and it hurt very much."

“So it was tight and painful. Please, do go on,” Hippolyta insisted.

“The giant lady’s foot squashed me against her sandal,” Timmy continued. “I couldn’t move, I couldn’t even breathe, and it felt like I was riding a really scary and really bumpy ride at the fair. I got dizzy and I felt like I was gonna throw up.”

“Oh, child, I’m deeply sorry for your suffering,” Hippolyta gave her sincerest condolence. “No child should have to suffer like this, especially on my own island. You are indeed brave if you went through such a horrible experience and live to tell the tale of your own plight.”

Timmy looked away, downcast. “I know...”

“There is no reason to fret over this now,” the giant queen assured the tiny boy at her feet. “You are in safe, capable hands now. I won’t let anyone willingly take advantage of your size so long as I watch over you the same way I watched over my daughter, Diana.”

“Th-Thank you, your majesty,” Timmy said, getting back to rubbing the ball of Hippolyta’s foot.

“I am curious, though, seeing as how you don’t appear to be physically hurt,” Hippolyta astutely observed from her throne, “you were suffering under the feet of Artemis, and I know for a fact that Artemis has the most powerful footsteps in Themyscira, yet when I look at you, I see no bruises nor bleeding. This must be because the magic that shrunk you down must have granted you with great physical endurance."

"I... I suppose," Timmy said, "but it still hurt."

"I cannot deny that. Tell me, what was Artemis’s feet like to you?”

Timmy’s face suddenly went beet red and turned his head away from embarrassment. “It’s alright, Timmy, you can tell me anything that’s on your mind,” his giantess guardian said. “I won’t be offended if you tell me.”

The inch-high boy felt like he could sweat bullets from his forehead. As embarrassing as it was to think about it, his mom always told him to be honest with his feelings, no matter how much he didn’t want to say it. “Well... when I was stuck in the scary lady’s shoe, I didn't feel like I was squished like a bug. Her feet were so... soft..."

“What was it that you said?” Hippolyta asked.

“I said it was... soft... like a pillow.”

“Like a pillow, you say?" The Queen of the Amazons sported a playful grin as she bent forwards and supported her chin on the back of her hands, listening intently. "I see, so despite Artemis having powerful footsteps and kicks, she keeps her feet soft. Please, tell me more about her feet."

Timmy's face flushed with a red beet hue, practically steaming from the embarrassment. "Well... they were soft... and they smelled like... like fruit."

Timmy’s face went so red, he was practically steaming. “They were soft and... and they smelled like... fruit.”

Hippolyta raised an eyebrow. “Fruit, you say?”

“Y-Yes. Fruit and... and coconut.”

“Interesting," the giant queen mused, turning her eyes to the side, noting the tiny boy’s astute sense of smell and the type of lotion Artemis rubbed on her feet. With a sly smile, she brought her foot closer to Timmy, who backed away as she gently revealed her immaculate toes to his face. "Then tell me, Timmy, what does my feet smell like to you?”

Timmy stopped for a moment, wondering if this was really happening, but didn't question the matter of his newfound loyalty to his giant adoptive mother. He gripped the toes and inhaled the sweet scent emanating from the giant foot flesh, smothered with a certain lotion that almost smelled like the flavor of yogurt his mom bought from the store.

“It smells like... vanilla.”

“I see...” Hippolyta felt her tiny adopted son reach her heel, reaching every nook and cranny her foot had to offer. “I believe you’ve rubbed every spot on this foot, little one,” she said, slapping her foot down and raising the other up by her heel. “It’s time you started on this foot.”

Timmy immediately went to work with the other foot, starting with the toes, gently and thoroughly rubbing his tiny hands between the giant digits. Hippolyta dipped her head back and sighed, feeling that wondrous stimulating sensation of her shrunken charge's hands thoroughly working through the surfaces of her toes.

What happens next?

1.) Hippolyta pins her foot down on Timmy; she's feeling playful.
2.) Hippolyta pins her foot down on Timmy; she wants to help him face his fears.
3.) The foot massage continues; Timmy has done a decent job.
1551214311112.title: Timmy's Traumatic Toe Tale

choices: Invoking the Wrath of the Queen
Escaping the Wrath of the Queen
15512143111121.content:
A playful smile spread across Hippolyta's lips as she suddenly scrunched her toes together, pinning the now-panicking tiny boy between them. She gently and regally lifted up her foot, watching and feeling Timmy struggling between her mighty digits, feeling slightly tickled by his efforts to escape. Timmy, on the other hand, was far from having fun. He felt like his torso would snap between the pressure of the two titanic toes. The smell of vanilla became overpowering. Try as he could, Timmy couldn't break free from the hold.

"Your Majesty, what are you doing to me!?" Timmy shrieked, struggling against the tightness of the toe's grip.

Hippolyta emitted an amused chuckle. “I am merely toying with you, Timmy. Try as I might, I could not resist the urge.”

"But you said you wouldn't take advantage of my size!" Timmy cried.

“It is true I said that, but as much as I enjoy playing with small insects and animals scuttling about my toes, I am also helping face your fear of being small. There are others outside this room who wish to crush you under their feet, so I am preparing you for the ones who do try.” The giant queen of the Amazons gently clenched her toes, a satisfying smirk spread across her delicate features as she watched her tiny ward struggle between her beautiful digits. “In addition, I am receiving a lovely foot massage from my son, so you consider it a win-win.”

“But… but I…”

Hippolyta lowered her foot, loosened her toes, and dropped Timmy back on the floor. While Timmy took a moment to recover, the giant queen moved her massive foot over his body, gently and firmly pinning him between her enormous sole and the floor. Hippolyta’s immaculate toes blanketed Timmy’s torso except for his arms and head while the poor boy cried, wriggled, and beat the giantess’s toes. “Let me go! Stop it, Your Majesty, please! You’re hurting me!”

"My apologies, Timmy," Hippolyta said, gently easing the pressure on the tiny boy, allowing him to break his arms free. "There, now you can reach my toes better. I bet you can really smell that vanilla smell, can you?"

Timmy felt like he was about to cry. The sensation of being planted by the giant queen's feet immediately brought him back to those short but traumatic moments when he was pinned underneath Artemis's foot when he was accidentally scooped into her sandal. It hurt then, and it still hurt now. The shrunken boy began to sob while he used his free arms to push and beat Hippolyta's toes, trying to free him from this claustrophobic sensation. Unfortunately, his beat felt like little massages to the queen, as she threw her head back and sighed contently.

"Ah, that feels good, Timmy," Queen Hippolyta said, wiggling her toes at the delightful feeling. "Now don't forget to get in between the toes."

Try as much as he could, Timmy couldn't get free of his adoptive mother's giant toes. He cried, he begged, he beat, and he pushed, but the toes were too powerful for him to budge. Even if he did try, the giantess would perceive his beating and pushing on her feet as part of his frantic massage. He felt his breathing, heart rate, and anxiety race. He had to escape the foot. He had to escape this claustrophobic feeling. He had to escape.

What happens next?

1.) Timmy continued to massage Hippolyta's toes; she is satisfied.
2.) Timmy continued to massage Hippolyta's toes; she isn't satisfied.
3.) Timmy has a panic attack; Hippolyta comforts the boy.
4.) Timmy managed to escape Hippolyta's toes; she punishes him for his resistance.
5.) Timmy managed to escape Hippolyta's toes; he escapes before he faces punishment.
15512143111121.title: Teasing Timmy with Her Toes

15512143111122.content:
The satisfactory smirk on Hippolyta's faded into impassiveness as she suddenly scrunched her toes together, pinning the now-panicking tiny boy between them. She gently and regally lifted up her foot, watching and feeling Timmy struggling between her mighty digits, feeling slightly tickled by his efforts to escape. Timmy, on the other hand, was far from having fun. He felt like his torso would snap between the pressure of the two titanic toes. The smell of vanilla became overpowering. Try as he could, Timmy couldn't break free from the hold.

"Your Majesty, what are you doing to me!?" Timmy shrieked, struggling against the tightness of the toe's grip.

Hippolyta emitted an amused chuckle. “I am merely toying with you, Timmy. Try as I might, I could not resist the urge.”

"But you said you wouldn't take advantage of my size!" Timmy cried.

“It is true I said that, but as much as I enjoy playing with small insects and animals scuttling about my toes, I am also helping face your fear of being small. There are others outside this room who wish to crush you under their feet, so I am preparing you for the ones who do try.” The giant queen of the Amazons gently clenched her toes, a satisfying smirk spread across her delicate features as she watched her tiny ward struggle between her beautiful digits.

“But… but I…”

Hippolyta lowered her foot, loosened her toes, and dropped Timmy back on the floor. While Timmy took a moment to recover, the giant queen moved her massive foot over his body, gently and firmly pinning him between her enormous sole and the floor. Hippolyta’s immaculate toes blanketed Timmy’s torso except for his arms and head while the poor boy cried, wriggled, and beat the giantess’s toes. “Let me go! Stop it, Your Majesty, please! You’re hurting me!”

“Consider this a trial for you, child,” Hippolyta stated regally, ignoring the tiny kid’s pleas to free him. “You have been shrunken down in a cruel twist of fate, stranded here on our island, and battered against Artemis’s feet. If you are to survive in your current size, then you must face your fear of the giants starting from the ground up.”

Hippolyta wiggled her toes slightly, increasing the pressure on Timmy’s diminished body further, making him scream in pain. “Take heed, young Timmy Walker. There are those who will see you as an ant and therefore do not show mercy. However, there are certain ants in this world that have survived by falling creatures much larger than them with their tiny yet lethal sting. In order to break my foot’s hold on you, you need to learn how to survive in your current size. If you can somehow escape my foot, then I will grant you an early day’s rest to recover from your situation.”

“Wh-Wh-What will happen if I don’t?” Timmy squeaked out the question over the pressure on his lungs.

“If you fail, then the punishment will be to continue your labors on my feet until you are done, adding to becoming insoles for my sandals for the rest of the night,” Hippolyta informed the small boy, who shuddered at the thought of being inserted into a giantess’s sandal again. “Take note, Timmy. In Themyscira, an Amazon must steel themselves against their fears and adapt to their failures, even our children. That is what makes us the fearless warriors of this island, and that is what I will make of you.”

“L-L-Like a soldier?” Timmy inquired.

“No, child. Fearless.”

Timmy whimpered and beat against Hippolyta’s mighty toes, but he couldn’t even trigger a reflex. Perhaps his fists were too small to be felt beating against the giant toes? Too small, too soft, and too blunt. It was like earlier when he was trapped in Artemis’s shoe and he was pinned under her foot.

That’s when it occurred to him. He knew how to escape this situation, just like how he did with Artemis’s foot! Timmy dug his nails and his bared teeth into the ridged tip of Hippolyta’s big toe, and he did it hard for good measure.

What happened afterwards?

1.) Hippolyta feels the bit; Timmy has passed the trial.
2.) Hippolyta feels nothing; Timmy has failed the trial.
15512143111122.title: Timmy's Trial by Toes

155121431112.content:
“Now then, Timmy, for your first task,” Hippolyta said, guiding the little boy in her hands onto the nightstand, “I want you to feed me the fruit in that bowl.”

Hippolyta lowered the boy with cupped hands to the nightstand, tilting them to prompt Timmy to hop off and land on the surface of the small stand level to Hippolyta’s chest. The tiny boy watched as Hippolyta bent towards to be at eye level with her new charge, getting a better look at each other.

To Hippolyta, the tiny boy was so young, innocent, and adorable, but so helpless at his size. One more wrong step and he would become a stain on the bottom of an Amazon’s shoe. To Timmy, Hippolyta was the most beautiful woman he had ever seen, admittedly even more beautiful than his mom. She had the face of a caring mother about her and a lovely voice that could only be viewed as both motherly and commanding.

“This task is quite simple,” Hippolyta explained. “You will bring forward a grape for me to eat only one at a time, but be sure to not drop them anywhere except for my mouth. Given your size, I do not wish for you to strain yourself bringing two or more grapes for me. When you have finished feeding me the last grape and not drop one on the ground, you will have succeeded in your task, understood?”

“Y-yes, your highness,” Timmy answered.

Without another word, Hippolyta slumped down in her bed in her fullest graceful splendor, her head inclined on the bed’s soft pillows. She placed her hands on her breasts, closed her eyes, and opened her mouth.

Timmy took a quick moment to observe the titanic Amazonian queen lying down in her bed, the way she folded her hands over her breasts, the posture she chose... he couldn’t exactly describe the beauty behind it all. She looked like a true goddess, standing as tall as the stairs of said goddesses that Timmy noticed the statues of in the palace on the way. A goddess in need of an insignificant bug to serve on hand and foot.

“Well? I am waiting, my young charge,” Hippolyta said, snapping him out of his daze.

“Uh..! S-Sorry!” Timmy squeaked as he ran to the fruit bowl, picking out a grape, holding with both hands like a giant beach ball, and returning to the edge of the nightstand.

Timmy grabbed the grape so he could toss it into Hippolyta’s mouth. As he approached the edge, however, he found himself pausing before a curious, yet dangerous sight. He ended up staring directly into the open maw of Queen Hippolyta herself. The inside of her open mouth looked like a deep, fleshy pit, framed by her lips, her ivory teeth, and her wriggling tongue lined with moist, spongy texture. Timmy looked deeper inside the giantess’s maw and saw the back of her throat, the gateway to her esophagus, a dark squelching tunnel that led to the inside of her stomach, marked overhead by her bobbing uvula.

Timmy felt a shiver run through his body; he was old enough to know what happened when food was eaten and ends up in his stomach. Remembering his task, Timmy tossed down the first grape onto Hippolyta’s tongue. The instant the grape hit her taste buds, Hippolyta quickly sealed her lips shut, bringing the grape to her molars and compressing it with a crunch.

Timmy watched with fascination as the giantess’s jaws made quick work of the grape. He could hear every juicy crunch with each motion of her jaws, and her deep, nasally breathing to accompany the music of her mastication. After a few seconds, the giantess swallowed, her neck bobbing inward to send the crushed remains of the grape down to her stomach while her mouth opened for more.

For the next several grapes, Timmy repeated this routine, sending the fruit into Hippolyta’s mouth to be chewed, swallowed, and digested without ever dropping one by accident. With a few more grapes left in the bunch, Timmy plucked another one to feed the giantess.

What happens next?

1.) Timmy successfully completes the task.
2.) Timmy unsuccessfully completes the task.
3.) Timmy falls into her open mouth!
4.) They are interrupted by another Amazon!
155121431112.title: Hippolyta’s Tiny Fruit Feeder

1551214311123.content:
Timmy carried his latest plucked grapes in both arms. He carried it over to the edge of the nightstand and looked over to aim the grape into the giantess’s yawning maw. In that moment, Hippolyta breathed a deep sigh, sending hot breath in the boy’s face that would eventually prove to be a major mistake.

The breath not only make Timmy grimace, but because the nightstand was made of smooth, polished marble, any hot breath would turn into moisture. The edge of the nightstand was moistened, making Timmy’s footing unstable. He slipped on the edge, and he went screaming into the dark, fleshy pit, hurtling past the gaping lips, through two rows of white ivory teeth, and over the gargantuan tongue. His fall abruptly stopped when he was lodged into Queen Hippolyta’s esophagus.

Suddenly, Hippolyta’s windpipe was clogged up like a cork in a bottle. She threw herself into a sitting position as she choked and gagged on the wriggling tiny boy in the back of her throat. The gagging was so loud, it echoed out of the chambers and immediately drew attention from her guard. Philippus and her troop stormed into the chamber, watching with fright as their queen grasped her throat, turning blue in the face.

“Your highness!” Philippus exclaimed as she ran to the queen’s side. “Quick! Someone get her some water!”

Persephone instantly ran to fetch a jug of water and a glass for the choking queen. Philippus quickly went from behind and grabbed Hippolyta around the abdomen. She quickly constricted her arms in spurts to dislodge the obstruction suffocating her from the inside. Hippolyta’s face was starting to turn purple.

“Hold on, my queen! We’ll get whatever’s choking you out!” Philippus tried to assure the queen.

The tiny boy stuck inside the back Hippolyta’s throat wasn’t faring much better. His legs were stuck inside the epiglottis where the flap separated the esophagus from the lungs. Hippolyta’s vocal chords were so close in proximity, her constant coughing and gagging seemed like explosions in his ears.

The jaws continuously jolted along with bright flickers of light pouring in from the opening of the mouth. The tongue was too moist and slippery for Timmy to grab ahold to pull himself up. His panicking overwhelmed him as he tried to claw out of the throat, but that only made it worse. The more he wriggled, the deeper he was pushed down.

“Please, your majesty, don’t eat me!” Timmy begged for his life.

Suddenly, he felt tiny bursts of air pushing him from deep inside the throat, pushing a little further up the tongue. Someone was giving her the Heimlich maneuver. They were trying to force him out of her windpipe. Timmy whimpered as he reached for the back of the tongue and tried to pull himself out of the epiglottis. Then after a few squeezes and a few pushes of the Heimlich...

1.) ...Hippolyta swallows Timmy.

2.) ...Hippolyta coughs up Timmy.
1551214311123.title: Timmy's Terrible Tumble!

choices: Hippolyta Rides Out with Her Swallowed Charge
Hippolyta Attends Dinner with Her Swallowed Charge
Hippolyta Sleeps with Her Swallowed Charge
15512143111231.content:
The more times Hippolyta was given the Heimlich maneuver, the more times it took for Timmy to be dislodged from the giantess’s windpipe. It was working because Hippolyta was beginning to breathe inward again, though less than outward. Her faithful general kept pushing on her lungs to rescue the boy from an unfortunate digestive fate. After this was over, Hippolyta knew that this was an unfortunate circumstance, but nonetheless, she had to administer her punishment to the boy because this counted as an automatic failure.

After a few pushes from Philippus, Timmy was pushed out of the epiglottis and launched onto the back of the tongue. Timmy laid flat on the rear bumps along the edge of Hippolyta’s tongue, crying at the horrific trauma he endured. He got himself up to crawl over the tongue and out the mouth when his head his something moist from up above.

All of a sudden, the world inside of Hippolyta’s mouth and throat as her gag reflex kicked in. Timmy’s entire world jolted around him as the tongue suddenly bucked him to the back of the throat and a sudden booming gag blasted behind him.

Outside, Hippolyta began to choke once more, frightening her guard. The tiny boy hit his head on his uvula, triggering her reflex which caused her tongue to buck the obstruction back into her throat. She held her hands to her throat to slow Timmy’s accidental descent down her esophagus. No matter how much she tried, Hippolyta couldn’t resist her reflex as they threatened to pull him down into her digestive tract.

With so much regret, Hippolyta couldn't hold on any longer, so she swallowed. Hippolyta grimaced as her esophagus squeezed the wriggling bulk inside, feeling him descend to plop into her stomach. Hippolyta quickly jumped on her feet and breathed normally, holding her belly with a shocked face.

“Your highness, are you alright?” Philippus asked.

“No. No, I’m not,” Hippolyta answered, her shock never leaving her face. “I... I swallowed my charge."

Inside, Timmy had lived one of the worst experiences of his newly tiny life. He was so close to being coughed out of Hippolyta’s throat when he accidentally caused her to choke again. The tongue sent him over the edge of her throat and his entire body was stuck inside. He felt the gentle, protective hands of the giantess trying to hold him from being swallowed down until he was pulled at the peristalsis by his legs and was forced deeper into the giantess's body.

After a painful five seconds down the esophagus, Timmy was squeezed into the stomach, filled up with saliva, acid, and a single tiny boy. After splashing in that hot, shallow pool at the bottom of the fleshy cavern, the size of the inside of a minivan, Timmy began to panic. He quickly swam up to the stomach walls, screamed, and began to beat his fists against the malleable wall.

“Please, your majesty, let me out!” Timmy screamed. “I don’t wanna be digested!”

Hippolyta felt the tiny beats in her stomach. She covered her belly with her hands while the other Amazon guards huddled around her to get a good listen. They could faintly hear the tiny screams of the boy coming from inside her belly. It sounded muffled, but it confirmed without a doubt that it was his voice.

“So it’s true,” Artemis said. “You swallowed the son of man.”

“How could this happen?” Persephone asked.

“He fell into my mouth while feeding me grapes as part of his own test,” Hippolyta explained.

“Then he has failed the test,” Artemis deduced.

“It would seem so.”

“So keep him there,” the redhead suggested. “He should not have failed at such an easy task, and yet, there he resides in the belly of our queen. Surely this is a mercy for arriving at these shores as small as a bug.”

“No. I would rather have the boy alive and unspoiled than to suffer a fate worse than death,” Philippus argued with the fierce Amazon. “The boy may be the son of man, but he is still a child. You would personally forsake the life of a young one for nutrition in our queen’s body.”

“If he can endure torture at our feet, what’s makes you think he can’t endure torture in our own bellies?”

“Enough,” Hippolyta said, turning her attention to the crying minuscule boy in her stomach. “Timmy, it is I, Hippolyta. Are you okay?”

“No!” Timmy yelled from inside the Hippolyta’s stomach. “You just swallowed me, and it was so tight, I couldn’t breath. Now I’m stuck in your tummy and I can’t climb out. It’s dark and it’s gross and it’s stinky and it’s wet and... and... I want my mommy!”

“Timmy? Timmy, listen to my voice. Focus on my voice,” Hippolyta said calmly. “I need you to calm down. Panicking will only lead to disaster. I want you speak to me as calmly as you can. Are you hurt? Do you feel at least the slightest burn anywhere in your body?”

Timmy sniffled. “N-No. I’m... I’m just scared! Please, your majesty, I’m sorry for falling into your mouth! I’m sorry I almost choked you to death! Please let me out! I don’t wanna die!”

“Your majesty, please, you must allow the boy to take his punishment in your belly,” Artemis insisted. “He has set foot on the shores of Themyscira, failed at a simple task of serving you, and nearly killed you by lodging himself in your throat. This is the punishment he deserves!"

“But he is only a child,” Philippus countered. “Children his age make mistakes, but we would never want a child to die. Though he has failed in a simple task, your highness, allow us to give him the appropriate punishment that does not involve digestion.”

Hippolyta stopped and thought this dilemma through. The young boy in her stomach did indeed set foot on Themyscira, but he was a lonely survivor of a fatal plane crash the size of a bug. He had already suffered so much, she didn't want him to suffer a grim fate inside her body... but then again, he survived Artemis’s toes and doesn’t feel pain of digestion.

“I have made my decision,” Hippolyta said, turning to her stomach and rubbing it gently in circles. “Timmy, what recently transpired was an accident, but you have nonetheless failed your own training. Therefore, as punishment, you will remain inside my stomach until the next morning.”

“What!? Nooooo!” Timmy furiously pounded against the stomach walls, trying to get his giantess captor nauseatingly suck. Unfortunately, to Hippolyta, the tiny boy’s punches were ticklish at best, and she placed her hand on her belly in response. “Please, your majesty, let me out of here! I don’t wanna stay in your tummy! I don’t wanna die!”

“I know, child, but rest assured that you will not die by my own stomach,” Hippolyta said, patting her belly gently. “Whatever force has shrunken you has left you with high endurance, meaning if you survived under Artemis’s foot, you will survive inside my belly. Trust me, child, this is the best place for you.”

“But I don’t wanna stay in here! It’s dark... and stinky... and wet... and-!”

“You will do well to take the queen’s punishment, boy. This is what you deserve for nearly choking her to death,” Artemis scolded the young tiny captive, making him jump from stern tone, which Hippolyta felt with a little shiver.

“That’s enough, Artemis,” she rebuked the red-haired warrior, turning to her belly. “Timmy, even though it was an accident that you nearly choked me, you nevertheless failed your training and you are now facing the consequences for your actions. Think of your time in my stomach as a gentle reminder of those actions. With each failure in your training, your time inside my body will be extended, or I will administer a more appropriate punishment. You are young, so use your time in my stomach wisely to reflect on your mistakes and how you can better avoid the consequences.”

“But I... I...” Timmy felt all Hope slip away as he slipped against Hippolyta’s stomach wall into a slump, feeling a new wave of tears leak from his eyes. “I’m sorry! I didn’t mean for you to choke because of me! I promise I’ll do better! I promise!”

“I know you will, Timmy. I believe you.” Hippolyta rubbed her belly in circles, gently massaging the inch-high boy slumping against the inside walls of her stomach. “In the meantime, you’ll have to remain inside my stomach until tomorrow morning. If you need anything, just tap on the walls."

“W-Will I have to stay in here during supper time?” Timmy asked.

“I’m afraid so,” the giant queen of the Amazons ruefully answered. “This is part of the punishment. But don’t worry, I’ll be sure to take special care to provide you food so it does not appear physically repulsive.”

“Oh. Okay.” Timmy shuffled in his slump so he was laying against the stomach walls like he would in a bathtub, filled with digestive acids that didn’t sting or tingle his body, previously masticated food, and whatever else the giantess consumed.

This was Timmy’s new life now: servant or slave to the queen of the Amazons who wouldn’t hesitate to step on him like a bug or swallow him whole as part of her punishment. No matter how much he wanted it, he couldn't escape it all.

What happens next?

1.) Skip to the afternoon with Hippolyta riding her horse.
2.) Skip to the evening with Hippolyta attending dinner.
3.) Skip to nighttime with Hippolyta fast asleep.
4.) Skip to the next morning when Hippolyta lets Timmy out.
15512143111231.title: Queen-Sized Stomach

choices: Hippolyta's Desire to Keep Timmy Swallowed
The Female Survivor of the Plane Crash
155121431112311.content:
Timmy soaked woefully in the fleshy, warm tub of green digestive juices and mushed food within Hippolyta's stomach. He could hear everything that went on inside the Amazon Queen's body. Her heartbeats, her breathing, even her stomach's gurgling. It didn't help that he was trapped inside this stinking, dark prison until morning over an accident, even if it was within his adopted mother's body.

Another part Timmy didn't like was how he felt Hippolyta move around from the inside, sloshing him and her meal around her stomach. This was evident when he felt the stomach jostle as Hippolyta rose up from her bed. “I will be taking my horse out for a stroll. I will be back soon,” Hippolyta addressed her guards.

Suddenly, the entire stomach jiggled and swayed with the rhythm of her footsteps, with Timmy being swished from left to right and back. It was difficult for the tiny eight year-old boy to lie down in the same position when Hippolyta continued to walk outside.

The entire stomach jostled with every step Queen Hippolyta took. Inside, Timmy and all of the other masticated mush soaked in saliva and digestive fluids were sloshed around within the green smelly pool from one stomach lining to the other. It felt like a ship caught in the terrible tropical storm. The bubbling growling and groaning didn’t help one bit either.

All of a sudden, that storm turned violent when Timmy felt the stomach suddenly lift up like an elevator ride and suddenly crash. In that crash, Timmy was bounced upwards and then down into the pool of acids, soaking him from head to toe. He resurfaced from the acids, coughing and sputtering that disgusting fluid. Some of it already splashed into his mouth and it tasted like throw up.

“HEY!”

“My apologies, Timmy,” the Queen’s voice boomed up above as she gently rubbed her belly from the outside, gently patting it to give off gentle jostles to the child inside, “I was merely mounting my horse. I had not known how the motions would affect the insides of my stomach.”

“W-Where are you going?” Timmy asked.

“We will be heading towards a ridge overlooking the sea,” Hippolyta said. “It’s where I like to go and gather my thoughts.”

“How long will the trip take?”

“Not too long, Timmy, perhaps ten minutes,” Hippolyta answered. “Don’t worry, Timmy, I’ll tell you when we’re there so you may better grace yourself for when I dismount.”

“Okay.”

From the inside of the queen’s belly, Timmy felt the gentle jostling of not Hippolyta’s strolls, but the hoof steps of her mounted horse making way through the Amazon city. With nothing to do, Timmy curled up in a fetal position against the stomach walls and waited while the digestive safe gurgled and growled, slowly breaking down its other meals.

Such was the sad fate for the tiny boy trapped within the Amazon Queen’s stomach. Though Queen Hippolyta intended to release him from her belly the next morning, the fact remained was that Timmy was stuck in a smelly, fleshy, repulsive cage within the giant queen’s body. His tiny stature became soaked with digestive fluids and a thin layer of saliva. The stomach acids began to dissolve the masticated food, but his clothes and body didn’t feel a tingle or sizzle. Supposedly, it was a blessing and a curse to be this tiny and immune to physical harm.

Ten minutes passed and shortly after, Timmy felt the stomach stop jostling. “We are here,” Hippolyta informed Timmy. “Brace yourself, Timmy, I am about to dismount.”

Timmy gripped the stomach lining tight. As Hippolyta dismounted, her entire stomach fell with her, feeling like the drop of a watery thrill ride which made Timmy yelp as he felt the brief sense of vertigo followed by the splash of hot acids. The boy coughed and choked that disgusting throw-up flavor out of his mouth.

“Are you alright, Timmy?” Hippolyta asked the boy in her belly.

“Uh-huh,” Timmy answered back, “I got some If your throw-up in my mouth.”

“My apologies for that,” the queen said sincerely and lightly, “but it is fortunate for you that I don’t intend to move for a while. I spend many hours on a calm day sitting on the ledge, looking into the horizon with deep thought. Though you are inside of me, you are actually the first person in a long time to join me in contemplation.”

“I... I wish that counted as joining you,” Timmy said. “I can’t see the horizon from inside here.”

“That is quite unfortunate indeed.” Queen Hippolyta rubbed her stomach as she stared into the open see, the sun’s reflection shining off the glistening surface of the water. “Fate has not been kind to you this day, young Timmy. You have been shrunk in a terrible disaster that has claimed your family, you drifted to our shores alone, suffered under the foot of my guards, and now you are caged within my stomach over an accident.”

“But the last one was your decision,” Timmy pointed out.

“Even so, I would never wish such a terrible fate upon you,” Hippolyta said. “You have already suffered so much in such little time. If there were any way for me to reverse your situation, then I would have done so right about now.”

“Is there?” the tiny boy asked.

“I am afraid not,” Hippolyta said sadly. “There are few mystics on this island with magicks capable of rivaling those of the gods, but even so, there is no spell which is capable of restoring you to full size. I may ask them to research a growth spell, and the closest they come to is a spell to better grow our crops before the harvest moon.”

Timmy slumped against the interior of Hippolyta’s stomach, stifling a sniffle. “It’s not fair. I lost my family in the plane crash, I lost my size, and now I’m stuck in your stinky, smelly, wet tummy.”

“But there is one thing you are overlooking, young Timmy,” the queen assured the bite-sized boy. “You are safe with me, within me. I have already decreed that I would be your guardian and protector and I already intend to with the love and firmness of both mother and father. I may not be the mother you lost, child, nor will I replace the hole they left in your heart, but I will do my best to pick up where she left off.”

Timmy felt a certain warmth from the way the giant queen vowed to watch over him. Standing up and wobbling against the malleable floor, Timmy leaned forward and hugged the stomach wall. Hippolyta flinched at the sensation of the boy hugging and nuzzling the stomach wall. She responded by gently clasping her hand at the area where Timmy was hugging her from the inside. She felt the warmth of Timmy’s newfound love for her, but there was something else... something different... something pleasurable.

“Thank you, Your Majesty!” Timmy screamed gleefully. “Thank you, thank you! I promise I won’t let you down, mama!”

The two suddenly shared an awkward pause amongst themselves. Timmy couldn’t help but slip and fall back into the pool of stomach fluids out of embarrassment and clasp his face with his hands. “Oh no! I’m sorry, I didn’t mean...!”

A gentle chuckle from Hippolyta eased the tension. “It is alright, child. I am not unfamiliar with the title of mother. After all, I am a mother myself, and I have more than enough experience with raising rambunctious children into maturity.”

“My mommy always told me I was an energetic little boy,” Timmy told her.

“That you are, young Timmy,” Hippolyta concurred. “That you are.”

With a gentle pat of her stomach, Hippolyta continued to stare out into the sea, feeling the young tiny bulk in her belly settle down.

What happens next?

1.) Hippolyta feels the desire to keep Timmy insider her stomach and tells him the story of Cronus and Zeus.
2.) Hippolyta sees a woman drifting to the shores of Themyscira.
3.) Hippolyta hears the gong ringing; it's time for dinner!
155121431112311.title: Hippolyta Rides Out with Her Swallowed Charge

choices: Temporary Time-Out Inside the Queen's Stomach
A Timeshare Inside the Queen's Stomach
A Permanent Stay Inside the Queen's Stomach
1551214311123111.content:
Hippolyta stared long and hard at the horizon beyond the sea. She placed her hand over her belly where her young, shrunken charge shifted and tickled the inside of her stomach. It was a strange sensation, feeling the tiny Timmy run around inside her, hugging the walls of her belly. It felt... pleasant. Like the tickles of his tiny footsteps and hands inside her body felt so pleasant, it sent a strange current through her nerves, through her heart, and into her loins.

It felt wrong, but... strangely, feeling the young boy in her belly was starting to turn her on. Her immaculate hand reached her belly and then moved downwards towards her groin area, and subconsciously, she started to rub that area. Her breathing became deep and pleasurable, her heart rate increased, and her mind was drifting to euphoria.

This was a pleasurable feeling, to be dominant over a tiny son of man... her new son of man... by trapping him inside her body, and he wouldn’t be harmed physically. She didn’t want this feeling to go away for some time. In fact, she didn’t want this to stop. At that moment, Timmy asked, “What’cha thinkin’ about, mama?” and forced her to return to reality.

"I was just thinking, Timmy, of an ancient legend of the gods eons ago," Hippolyta answered. "Tell me, child, have you heard the legends of Zeus and his pantheon?"

"No," came Timmy's reply from inside her body. "I don't know who Zeus is, or what a pan... pant..."

"A pantheon. It means 'many gods' in an old language," Hippolyta clarified. "There are many countries who have worshipped many gods in the dawn of mankind, and the gods of old in Ancient Greek legend is well-known throughout the entire world, and Zeus, the god of thunder, is the one who rules over them."

"I'm sorry, I don't know those legends, mama," said Timmy. "My mommy and I used to read Bible stories together."

"I see. So you and your family worshipped the One God, then," the Queen of the Amazons understood, rubbing her belly reassuringly. "I suppose I cannot make you change which god you may worship, young Timmy, but since you will be living among us, you will learn the legends of the Greek gods, and the story I am about to tell you is of how Zeus defeated the Titans and he and his brothers and sisters ascended to godhood."

Hippolyta felt the tiny boy shift around inside her stomach, which, in reality, was Timmy repositioning himself to listen to the story. "Long ago, at the dawn of mankind, fearsome giants known as the Titans ruled the world, children of the sky god, Uranus, and the earth mother, Gaea. Out of all the Titans, Cronus was the most feared and he ruled the world.

"One day, Cronus received a prophecy from Gaea, telling him that one of his own children will rise against him and defeat the Titans," Hippolyta continued. "So Cronus devoured his infant children like little morsels, all of them who would grow inside his belly and become the gods we worship on this island. Rhea, the wife of Cronus, secretly sired Zeus in Crete, a city in Greece, and hid him away in a cave while he tricked Cronus into devouring a stone believing it was his son in swaddling.

"Zeus was raised in secrecy, and grew into an adult age where he rose against his father. The nymph who raised him, Adamanthea, gifted him a plant which would make Cronus throw up his sons and daughters he had consumed. Zeus and his brothers, Poseidon and Hades, and his sisters, Hera, Hestia, and Demeter, overthrew Cronus and the other Titans, becoming the gods who ruled the ancient world. Zeus became the ruler of the gods and helped forge the world we Amazons knew from ancient times."

"...that Cronus sounds like a real jerk."

Hippolyta couldn't help but laugh at Timmy's simple, but relevant comment. The laughter caused the stomach all around Timmy to surge each time Hippolyta's lungs rapidly ventilated with each laugh. "I suppose you are correct there, young Timmy," she chuckled, "Cronus was indeed a tyrant, and he needed to be imprisoned with his fellow Titans."

"Too bad that Zeus wasn't eaten by his mommy," Timmy mumbled.

"Oh?" Hippolyta asked. "And why is that, do you think?"

"Because mommies are supposed to be pretty and kind, and Zeus's mommy was a Titan, right?" Timmy inquired.

"Yes, she was, child."

"And you said the Titans were giants, right?"

"Indeed."

"Then, maybe if Zeus's mommy swallowed him like you did to me, then maybe he'd be safer inside of her tummy, don't you think?"

A sudden chill ran through Hippolyta's body. The boy wasn't wrong; in fact, it seemed to have triggered a stimulating response throughout her very essence. Her cheeks flushed vermillion, her heart began to race faster, and she felt her breathing become slightly labored. "Actually, that is exactly it," the Queen of the Amazons, said, holding her hand against her belly tighter. "In fact, that's why I told you that story."

"Mama?" Timmy inquired, confused by the last verse she said.

"It is because the way you move around the inside of my body, the way you shift yourself around inside my stomach... there is this feeling that I have never felt before," Hippolyta said, lightly patting her belly, jostling her adopted son inside with her digested mush. "Since you, a child shrunken by our own mystical barriers was accidentally swallowed and trapped within my belly, I cannot help but wonder what Cronus felt when he swallowed his children, when he imprisoned them in his belly while they grew into adulthood, knowing there was no way out for them."

"Mama, what are you talking about?" Timmy asked, confused by her explanation.

"I cannot explain this feeling in words, but perhaps this is what it feels like as a mother to carry her own child around in her body months before she is due," Hippolyta wondered aloud, rubbing circles around her torso. She gently reached under her robes and felt around the smooth skin on her belly at the spot where she felt Timmy from the inside. "So small, residing inside a mother's body while she protects their little one from any danger on the outside. Perhaps... perhaps this is what this feeling is. The desire to protect you from the dangers of the outside world by keeping you safe inside of my stomach, never to let you out, never to let the feeling of you moving inside of me go."

"What!?" Timmy pushed against the stomach walls. "Mama, no, don't say that! Don't say I wanna stay in here! I wanna come out like we promised!"

The moment the tiny boy pushed from the inside of Hippolyta's stomach, it sent a certain stimulation that felt almost pleasurable to her, almost like a sexual stimulation. "Yes, like that, Timmy. Every time you touch the surface of my stomach walls like that, every time you move, it makes me feel so different, but in a good sense of the way. It makes me want to keep you inside me, sealed away inside of my body so I can relish your tickling scuttling inside me forever."

"Mama, please!" the boy begged, pushing against the stomach with all his might. On the outside, Hippolyta felt a little lump form from the outside of her torso. She gently pushed it back in, knocking Timmy back into the digestive acids.

"I want to keep you inside of me, young Timmy, as my own personal internal servant," Hippolyta said. "I want to feel you moving inside of me, safe from the dangerous world at your current size. In exchange, you will have a place to rest, you will eat what I eat, and drink what I drink. It will require some adjustments first so you may better accommodate your surroundings, but I would feel safe knowing you would be home, inside the stomach of a giant who serves her entire body for your wellbeing and protection."

Timmy was speechless at this point. He knew begging wouldn't help him escape, and any attempt to nauseate the Queen from the inside only aroused her further. He slumped against the stomach walls and brushed his cheek against the mucus-coated, fleshy surface. He felt her stomach walls curled up around him, twitching, and jostling. "If I did want to stay in your tummy, would you let me out?"

"That would depend on the matter of when you want to exit my body and how you exit it," came the Queen's response from above him.

What was Timmy's answer?

1.) Timmy doesn't want to stay inside Hippolyta's stomach; Hippolyta reluctantly agrees.
2.) Timmy doesn't want to stay inside Hippolyta's stomach; Hippolyta keeps him imprisoned.
3.) Timmy wants to stay inside Hippolyta's stomach, but under certain conditions.
4.) Timmy wants to stay inside Hippolyta's stomach forever.
1551214311123111.title: Hippolyta's Desire to Keep Timmy Swallowed

155122.content:
Name: Aiden Jones
Age: Variable
Eyes: Blue
Hair: Blonde
Height: Variable
Weight: Variable
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Aiden Jones is the son to Dr. Jason and Sandra Jones, two of the top scientific minds of STAR Labs who met on the job, fell in love, and got married. Because of their constant exposure to STAR Labs technology and chemicals, Aiden was born with a birth defect which rendered him tiny-sized. Fearing for his life, size, and age, the Joneses hired a nanny to watch him and protect him, either a female superhero or a supervillain in disguise.

Main Story:

Aiden Jones was born a miracle, or a freak of science, whichever people preferred to see him as. Aiden was born to Dr. Jason and Sandra Jones, two of the top scientific minds of STAR Labs who met on the job, fell in love, got married, and conceived their son. However, Aiden was born small as a result of his parents’ repeated exposure from radiation and chemicals in STAR Labs. Aiden’s birth made national headlines, and the tiny baby was made an instant celebrity.

Unfortunately, this opened up so many possibilities for the world’s villains to target little Aiden for kidnapping and ransom. Fearful for their baby son’s life, the Joneses tightened their security for their penthouse home where the only people who had access there was themselves and their nanny, a beautiful woman who was tasked for caring the penthouse and their baby.

In one route, the Joneses hired a female superhero as their nanny hoping to make a few extra bucks spare time and keep a vigilant eye of the tiny-born Aiden. In another route, the Joneses unknowingly hired a female supervillain who passed herself as their nanny hoping to hold Aiden captive in exchange for their experimental prototype. In either route, the nanny raises Aiden and along the way, discovers the metahuman powers that compensated for the boy's size.

Aiden, though while born the size of a pinkie finger, displays heightened endurance and resistance to harm and physical injury. This happens on occasion with Aiden, when he is accidentally stepped on by a giant woman or swallowed alive, showing no signs of burns or physical harm after he was released from the giant woman's digestive system.

The only question is, is the nanny a superhero or a supervillain?
155122.title: The Supernanny

choices: A Member(s) of the Superman Family
A Member(s) of the Batman Family
A Member(s) of the Justice League
1551221.content:
Dr. Jason and Sandra Jones were afraid for their Aiden's life. With so many break-ins, robberies, and experiments gone horribly wrong involving STAR Labs and its faithful employees, the Joneses were convinced that Aiden would be in danger of being kidnapped and held for ransom. After all, since Aiden was conceived at the size of an adult pinkie finger, he would be easy pickings for any villain who wants to use him as leverage for their dastardly schemes.

The Joneses ultimately decided to hire a nanny to watch over Aiden, to protect him and nurture him while they were away at work or some other important business. Since the exploits of Aiden's tiny size made the national headlines and made the baby an instant Internet celebrity, it made sense that they'd hire a female superhero(es) to watch over him and protect him from anyone trying to take advantage of his size to use as a bargaining chip.

When the superhero was first introduced to baby Aiden in his tiny form, she felt a certain maternal instinct kick in, since the baby was so adorable and innocent. Several months had passed, and the hero spent her free non-working hours to watch over Aiden, playing with him and attending to his needs. In case of any emergency, the hero would call upon another female superhero and gave her specific instructions to follow to fulfill the tiny baby's specific needs.

For the next several years, the hero raised Aiden like her own son. With the help of the other female superheroes, the nanny discovered Aiden’s meta-gene ability of high physical endurance against pressure and digestion to compensate his tiny size. A few instances of this occurred when they accidentally stepped on him, sat on him when they weren't looking, and even swallowing him when he crawled into their mouths. These were accidents to be sure, but the female superhero helped train Aiden to focus more on his gifted abilities and use them for good.

Depending on the story routes, Aiden’s life as a tiny bug boy under his giant maternal figure's watch is either happy, loving, and naïve, or is strict, boring, and overprotective. His role as a hero or a villain in the making is ambiguous.

The only question is, who is Aiden's nanny and mentor(s)?

Wonder Woman

(i.e. Kara Danvers, Karen Starr, Lana Lang, etc.)

A Member(s) of the Batman Family
(i.e. Barbara Gordon, Cassandra Cain, Katherine Kane, etc.)

1551221.title: Superhero

choices: One of the Gotham City Sirens
1551222.content:
Dr. Jason and Sandra Jones were afraid for their Aiden's life. With so many break-ins, robberies, and experiments gone horribly wrong involving STAR Labs and its faithful employees, the Joneses were convinced that Aiden would be in danger of being kidnapped and held for ransom. After all, since Aiden was conceived at the size of an adult pinkie finger, he would be easy pickings for any villain who wants to use him as leverage for their dastardly schemes.

The Joneses ultimately decided to hire a nanny to watch over Aiden, to protect him and nurture him while they were away at work or some other important business. That was their first and biggest mistake, because the nanny the Joneses hired was actually an infamous villainess in disguise with the intention of kidnapping them, holding them hostage to steal their latest prototype in STAR Labs and then killing them afterwards.

When the villainess was first introduced to baby Aiden in his tiny form, she felt a certain maternal instinct kick in, since the baby was so adorable and innocent. She bade her time from undergoing her plans by winning the Joneses' trust and given access to the passcodes inside of their penthouse suit. Several months had passed, and the villainess decided it was time for her to undergo her plan. It was relatively simple: Use her passcode to sneak into the penthouse, pluck Aiden from his bedroom, and disappear into the night while leaving behind no trace evidence. She transferred her earnings as a nanny to a private bank account, wiped all traces of it, and took Aiden under her wicked wing and waited until the heat cooled off.

For the next several years, the villainous vixen raised the tiny boy as her own son. With the help of other villainesses, the kidnapper discovered Aiden’s meta-gene ability of high physical endurance against pressure and digestion to compensate his tiny size. They experimented on it by squishing him under their feet, planting him under their enormous seats, and even swallowing them to see if he survived their digestive system. Aiden, in return, worked for his “mommas” and “aunties”, becoming a slave to their every whim.

Depending on the story routes, Aiden’s life as a tiny bug boy under his giant maternal figure's watch is either happy, loving, and naïve, or is torturous, sad, and miserable. His role as a hero or a villain in the making is ambiguous.

The only question is, who is Aiden's nanny and kidnapper?

One of Wonder Woman's Villains
(i.e. Cheetah, Giganta, Circe, Veronica Cale, etc.)

One of the Gotham City Sirens
(i.e. Harley Quinn, Poison Ivy, and Catwoman)

One of the Female Furies
(i.e. Granny Goodness, Lashina, Stompa, Mad Harriet, Gilotina, etc.)

-or-

One of the Female Assassins
(i.e. Talia al Ghul, Lady Shiva, Nyssa Ratko, Cheshire, etc.)
1551222.title: Villainess

15512221.content:
The villainess who kidnapped Aiden Jones is a one of Wonder Woman's villains.

Wonder Woman is known for having a Rogues Gallery consisting mostly of dangerous female adversaries, ranging from mystical threats like Circe and Cheetah, to more superpowered threats like Giganta and the Silver Swan.

The only question is, which one of Wonder Woman's enemies will kidnap Aiden Jones?

Barbara Ann Minvera/Cheetah: A former archaeologist who was endowed with mystic powers through a mystical ritual which turned her into a humanoid cheetah, Barbara Ann Minerva is one of Wonder Woman's most consistent arch-enemies. As the Cheetah, Barbara Ann Minerva is known for her speed, her feral ferocity, and her immense hatred for Wonder Woman. She is also known for being a cannibal too, given she's more animal than human.

Doris Zeul/Giganta: A scientist who was bullied due to her being born with a rare blood disease, Doris Zeul underwent a radiotherapy treatment which gave her the ability to grow from a normal-sized human being to a hundred foot tall giantess. As Giganta, Doris Zeul has repeatedly contended with Wonder Woman and failed, always falling hard with each defeat. At one point, she gained recognition for swallowing Ryan Choi/The Atom III, but regurgitated him not long after.

Circe: An immortal enchantress from Homer’s The Odyssey, Circe is known for her magical abilities to transform men into beast hybrids and vice versa, which makes her one of Wonder Woman's most dangerous enemies. At one point, she conceived a daughter, Lyta, with the War God, Ares, giving her a somewhat twisted sense of motherhood. Though somewhat reformed, Circe has helped Wonder Woman with magical trouble off and on.

-or-

Veronica Cale: The CEO of the technology-based Empire Enterprises. Considered to be the Lex Luthor of Wonder Woman’s Rogues Gallery, Veronica is both jealous of the Amazon Princess’s powers and resorts to using her resources to bring her down, even working with Wonder Woman’s worst enemies to accomplished her own goals. Her daughter Isadore lives in Themyscira in order for her soul to remain intact.
15512221.title: One of Wonder Woman's Villains

1552.content:
Marvel Comics is one of the biggest comic book companies in the world, notable for its more prominent locations such as Manhattan, its heroes such as Spider-Man, Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, and villains such as Doctor Doom, Red Skull, Thanos, and the Green Goblin.

In this route, we will be focusing on certain boy characters appearing in the DC Universe, either as a canon character such as young Peter Parker (a.k.a. Spider-Man), or an original character of your choice within the canon DC Universe. They will be shrunken, born tiny, or every woman in the DC Comics is bigger than the normal-sized character. The only question is, is the focus character from the DC Comics or an original character?
1552.title: Marvel Comics

15521.content:
The focus boy character is a character canon to the DC Universe.

Choose one of the following characters you want to focus on...

Peter Parker/Spider-Man: The orphaned son of the late Richard and Mary Parker and raised by his Uncle Ben and Aunt May. A shy school nerd often picked on by his peers, Peter was bitten by a spider infused with experimental radiation and granted him heightened agility, the ability to crawl onto surfaces, and to sense incoming danger. After his Uncle Ben was killed by a burglar he let go, Peter Parker realized his responsibility as a hero. "With great power comes great responsibility."

Miles Morales/Spider-Man: The son of Jefferson Davis and Rio Morales, and the second person to take up the heroic mantle of Spider-Man in the Ultimates universe. After the universe's Peter Parker died following his final battle with the Green Goblin and his villainous horde, Miles Morales was bitten by the same spider which infused Peter with similar spider powers, with the additional ability to camouflage and produce stun blasts. Miles works hard to carry on Peter Parker's legacy.

Benjamin "Benjy" Parker II: The biological son of Peter Parker/Spider-Jane and Mary Jane "MJ" Watson-Parker, and the younger brother of May "Mayday" Parker/Spider-Girl. Born in a universe where Peter Parker retires his Spider-Man mantle following a horrific battle with the Green Goblin, Benjy was born with with some of his father’s abilities, which includes superhuman strength and shooting off webbing. Because of his familial ties with Spider-Man and Spider-Girl, Benjy is often the target of enemy attacks.

-or-

Franklin Richards/Powerhouse: The biological son of Franklin Richards/Mr. Fantastic and Sue Storm/Invisible Woman, two central members of the Fantastic Four. Born mutated due to the astronomical radiation which gave Reed and Sue their powers, Franklin was gifted with psionic abilities and is one of the most powerful mutants in the world. He has the mutant ability to reshape reality, which, plus his familial ties with the Fantastic Four, makes him a target of enemy attacks.
15521.title: Canon

choices: Son of the World's Tiniest Mutant
15522.content:
The focus main boy character is an original character and non-canon to the main DC Comics storyline.

Choose one of these story routes you want to focus on...

An Inhuman Size-Changer: The boy is born normal-sized, but he is related to a female family member/friend's exposure to the Inhumans' Terrigen Bomb which activated her latent genetic ability to manipulate the size of anyone or anything she touches, including the boy with whom she flaunts her powers around him. In addition, the shrunken targets are also granted physical endurance and invincibility. The female size manipulator is either a hero, a villain, or an anti-hero; either way, she likes to have the boy tag along with her in her misadventures.

Son of the World's Tiniest Mutant: The boy is the son of the shrunken mutant, Shortpack, and the shape-shifting mutant, Raven Darkholme/Mystique, nine months after a brief one-night stand during their downtime from their field operation. Shortpack's mutant genes were passed down to his son, instantly shrinking him to the size of a #2 pencil eraser, small enough that only Jean Grey noticed his presence in Mystique's womb. After he was born, he was placed into the care Mystique's lover, Irene Adler/Destiny. The boy is often visited by his mother and her female X-Men friends until he was old enough to join attend Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters.

Sizing the Fourth Wall: The boy is a real world Marvel Comics teen fanatic who’s into most of the female characters but doesn’t like certain female characters such as the plus-sized heroine Big Bertha, or the fourth wall-breaking heroine, Gwenpool. Due to her ability to break the fourth wall, Gwenpool heard about the boy dissing her, so she grabs the boy and literally throws him into a comic panel where he appears tinier than the female characters he ogles. Either that or he is normal-sized and Gwen manipulates the comic’s perspectives so that the female characters appear as literal giants.

-or-

The Problem with Pym Particles: In this route, well introduce a few story routes involving Pym Particles, the experimental subatomic particles which could alter the size and mass of objects or other living beings. In one route, a bullying brother is give his comeuppance by his little sister who enlists the help of the Wasp. In the second route, a young street thief steals a container full of Pym Particles but is permanently shrunk. In the third route, one of Marvel’s terrorist organizations uses the Pym Particles to not only drastically alter the size of the female populace to become bigger than the male populace, but also their personalities so they have a sense of dominance over the male characters.
15522.title: Non-Canon

155224.content:
Each of these scenarios involves a boy affected by Pym Particles.

Which of these scenarios will apply to the shrunken boy?

The Pym Particle Problem Child: The boy is a bully who mostly picks on her little sister, who admires the shrinking heroines, Janet van Dyne and Nadia Pym, both of whom took up the mantle of the Wasp. One day, the brother takes the bullying too far, and in desperation, the sister sends a written letter addressed to Janet, asking her and Nadia to deal with her problem. After an arrangement with the bullying brother's female family members, the boy is shrunken down by a malfunctioning Pym Disk and is taught a lesson in humility, either through the Wasp, their friends, or his female family members.

The Pym Particle Plunderer: The boy steals a container of Pym Particles with the promise of payment by Monica Rappaccini, the current lead scientist of the Advanced Idea Mechanics (or A.I.M. for short) for her latest plan. During his heist, the boy is accidentally exposed to the Pym Particles, causing him to permanently shrink to the size of an ant. He is either caught and at the mercy of the giant female members of the Avengers (such as Wasp, She-Hulk, and Tigra), or he escapes but is sought by the giant villainesses.

-or-

The Pym Particle Plague: Monica Rappaccini successfully acquires the Pym Particles from the boy in the second route and genetically modifies it with the Mandrill’s mind-controlling pheromones so that it will affect the entire female population of Earth, including the heroes and villains. The male populace will shrink or the female heroes and villains will grow into giants. Either way, the females affected will establish a sense of dominance over the male populace. Follow a boy as he tries to survive the outbreak of the modified Pym Particles plague on the world.
155224.title: The Problems with Pym Particles

info.brief_description: Play as a young boy who interacts with a giant woman, or the other way around!
info.description:
Re-written with permission by cosmicdonut a.k.a. ButterBazooka, the original author.

You are a young boy, who is either shrunken by various circumstances, born tiny, or born normal-sized, all cases surrounded by giantesses of every kind. As either an original character from all different reaches of visual media, you either explore the route as a small boy as he goes through his life with giantesses involved in his life, or you explore the route as the giantess who interacts with said small boys. The giantesses can be either playful, maternal, oblivious, or cruel.

You are free to add anything to the storyline, so long as you follow these guidelines.

GUIDELINES:

1.) At the beginning of the story routes, when you're introducing an original character to your story route, make sure you add in this short bio.

Name:
Age:
Eyes:
Hair:
Height:
Weight:
Ethnicity:
Backstory:

FOR EXAMPLE:

Name: Tommy Winslow
Age: 10 years old
Eyes: Green
Hair: Brown
Height: 3' 9"
Weight: 116 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Tommy Winslow is the only son of Kelly Winslow, the younger brother of Lindsey and Brianna, and the older brother of Wendy. As a child, Tommy was doted on by his loving sister, Brianna, and initially volunteered to be the guinea pig for her experiments. As Tommy grew older, however, he realized that the side effects of Brianna's experiments have often humiliated him, thus making him cautious and distant from her. His cautious behavior has also turned hostile towards his brilliant sister.

Name: Angela "Mama Angie" Bennett
Age: 40 years old
Eyes: Black
Hair: Black
Height: 5' 10"
Weight: 182 lbs.
Ethnicity: White/Caucasian
Backstory: Angela Bennett is a lead stripper in the XXX Bombshells strip club in the red light district. A veteran stripper and dancer, she earned the moniker "Mama" after teaching and nurturing the younger dancers. Her thick assets, her D-cup breasts, and her luscious lips arouse her customers' fantasies. After her shifted ended at midnight, Angela would discover a certain baby boy, abandoned on the sidewalk, born the size of her thumb. She'd soon find another meaning to her stripper name "Mama Angie."

2.) The following is a list of simple rules that must be followed.
No giant males
No tiny females (but normal-sized women interacting with giantesses is encouraged)
No gore
No digestion (but possible reformation is encouraged)
No scat or piss content (but full tour is encouraged)
No sex
No unbirth
No futanari/hermaphrodites
No killing the main characters (but possible reformation is encouraged)
The maximum age for the boy characters must be 15 years or younger (if this is the case, make sure the lead character's age somehow regresses below 15 years).
The minimum age for the girl characters must be 3 years or older (on that note, keep the interactions with young girl/loli characters 9 years or younger at a minimum)

3.) Be sure to write in complete sentences, write with good grammar, and write each chapter in a minimum of three sentences. The only exception to this rule is if you are adding a chapter with multiple options.

4.) Do not end the story unless you're intending to looping the storyline into a different, preexisting chapter canon to the story route (This guideline was inspired by the looping storylines by Kooplan's Fire Emblem SW where the chapters labeled with (END) links to another preexisting chapter.)

5.) Above all else, have fun!!!
